Her husband is a driver and drives a rented rickshaw to provide transport services to passengers. Kaneez has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah to help her husband buy a rickshaw.  This will help him provide better-quality transport services without any time limitation to passengers and will also help him buy a business asset.

Kaneez's husband has been operating his business for past 4 years and Kaneez is hopeful that an investment will help him improve his income and the financial situation of the family.

loans.use: To buy a rickshaw for transportation business

loans.name: Octavio De Jesus

texts.es:
Desde muy joven Octavio aprendió la actividad de la fabricación de calzado, gracias a que su padre trabajaba en una empresa de calzado y se la enseñó desde temprana edad. Al aprender la actividad decidió montar su propio taller de fabricación de calzado el cual tiene más de 25 años de experiencia, y con el cual ha sacado su familia adelante. Octavio se encuentra casado y tiene 4 hijos de quienes manifiesta son su mayor motivación para trabajar fuertemente en su negocio. En su taller se ha caracterizado por ofrecer a sus clientes una gran calidad en sus productos y ofrecer muy buenos precios, por lo que ha tenido la oportunidad de captar un gran número de clientes para su negocio. En la actualidad, su negocio tiene más demanda por parte de sus clientes que la capacidad con la que cuenta para responder esta, por lo que Octavio está trabajando fuertemente para poder nivelar su capacidad de producción. Adicional a esto, a Octavio se le ha averiado una de sus máquinas, por lo que busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la reparación de una de sus máquinas y la compra de materias primas para la fabricación del calzado.

Octavio espera seguir creciendo en su negocio y seguir teniendo un buen taller de fabricación de zapatos. Además, Octavio espera que de esta manera su familia siga teniendo una buena calidad de vida y sueña con generar varios empleos en su taller.
texts.en:
From a very young age, Octavio has worked as a shoemaker. His father worked in a cobbler shop and taught Octavio the craft. After learning from his father, Octavio decided to open his own shop, and he now has over 25 years of experience working as a cobbler. Octavio works very hard to provide for his wife and four children, as they are his main motivation. 

In his workshop, he is known for offering his clients high quality products and good prices. In fact, he does such good work, that demand for his services exceeds his ability to finish orders, so Octavio works extremely hard in order to increase his productivity. Recently, one of Octavio’s machines has broken, and he is requesting this loan in order to purchase the parts necessary to repair the machine. He also plans to utilize support from the loan to purchase raw materials for making shoes.  

Octavio hopes to continue growing and developing his business so that he can offer employment to others. He also hopes that, as a result of his hard work, his family can continue to enjoy a good quality of life.

loans.use: to repair one of his machines and purchase raw materials for making shoes.

loans.name: Sandra Marcela

texts.es:
Sandra desde que tenía tan solo 17 años de edad aprendió la actividad del corte y cepillado del cabello y el arreglo de uñas, por lo que decidió montar un salón de belleza y comenzar a generar sus propios ingresos. Meses después de haber montado su negocio, decidió enfocarse en la atención a niños, por lo que decidió montar un salón de belleza infantil donde ofrece todos sus servicios a los niños del sector. Gracias al buen servicio que ofrece en su salón de belleza, sus clientes se incrementaron considerablemente en muy poco tiempo, y esto le ha permitido tener una mejor calidad de vida tanto a ella como a su familia. Ya hace aproximadamente 8 años que tiene su salón de belleza y este hasta la fecha ha crecido notablemente, y es por esto que Sandra busca seguir prestando un buen servicio. Con el ánimo de realizar algunas remodelaciones, Sandra busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de espejos, cepillos, tijeras, entre otros implementos de trabajo para renovar poco a poco su salón de belleza.

De esta manera renovará su espacio de trabajo y así será más atractivo para sus clientes. Además, que así podrá generar mayores ingresos y seguir cumpliendo poco a poco su sueño de tener un gran salón de belleza donde pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas y desde el cual pueda tener un futuro económico estable y mayores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
Since she was only 17 years old, Sandra has been learning the activity of cutting and grooming hair and doing manicures and pedicures, which is why she decided to set up a beauty salon and start generating her own income. Months after she set up her business, she decided to focus on providing the service for children, reason why she decided to set up a beauty salon for children where she offers all the services to the kids in the area. Thanks to the good service she offers at her salon, her customers increased considerably in a short period of time, and this has allowed her and her family to enjoy a better standard of living. It's been approximately 8 years since she opened her beauty salon and up to date it has noticeably grown, this is why Sandra wants to continue to provide a good service. With the purpose of making some remodeling, Sandra is looking for a loan to give her the opportunity to be able to afford mirrors, brushes and scissors, among other implements she uses at work, in order to little by little, renovate her beauty salon.
In this way she will renovate her workspace and it will become more appealing to her customers. Also, she will be able to generate a higher income and continue to accomplish her dream of having a big beauty salon where she can generate employment for the people who are in need and from which she can have a stable financial future and more opportunities to progress.

loans.use: to purchase mirrors, brushes, scissors, among other implements to renovate little by little her beauty salon

loans.name: Janeth

texts.es:
Janeth, de 21 años de edad, es una mujer alegre y cordial, además de trabajadora y empeñosa, con muchas ganas de progresar. Es soltera sin hijos.  Vive en compañía de su madre y sus 3 hermanos, habitando cómodamente la casa de su madre. La actividad que realiza Janeth es la venta de ropa confeccionadas por su madre, tanto de damas, caballeros y niños. Todos estos productos se los confecciona su madre en su pequeño taller en su casa y  ella se  encarga de venderlos entre sus familiares, amistades y vecinos, a quienes atiende de manera cordial y amable, logrando ganarse su preferencia, de esa manera ellos la recomiendan con otras personas, que al cabo de un tiempo se vuelven también sus clientes habituales. Tiene más de 3 años dedicándose a éste negocio y hasta el momento tiene el apoyo de su mamá quien le ayuda confeccionándole las prendas de vestir a pedido de sus clientes.
Considera su negocio bastante rentable por la demanda que tiene estos productos y las buenas ganancias que le deja. Le gusta su negocio ya que le genera ingresos económicos que le sirvieron para pagarse sus estudios superiores, apoyar a sus hermanos menores con sus estudios y los gastos de su hogar; y además de atender a las personas de manera amable, logrando ganarse una clientela regular. Por otro lado tiene planes de planes de formalizar su negocio y hacerlo crecer. Este será el préstamo número 5 con la institución MFP. Está muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado se siente a gusto con su banco comunal, pues  considera un grupo unido y solidario.
Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de materiales de costura como hilos, telas, elásticos y otros, para confeccionar ropa de damas, caballeros y niños, buscando precios más bajos por sus compras al contado y en volumen.
texts.en:
Janeth, age 21, is a cheerful and friendly woman. In addition, she is an industrious and hard worker who greatly desires to make progress. Janeth is single and does not have children. She lives comfortably with her mother and her three siblings in a house that her mother owns. Janeth sell women's, men's, and children's clothing that is produced by her mother. Her mother makes all of these garments from a small workshop in their home. Janeth is in charge of selling the clothes to relatives, friends, and neighbors. She attends to her customers in a cordial and friendly manner, thus gaining their loyalty. As a result, Janeth has been referred to other people who have also turned into repeat customers. She has been in this business for more than three years. Janeth currently has the support of her mother, who helps by producing the garments that have been requested by her customers.

Janeth considers her business to be profitable because of the adequate demand for her products and the good profits she has earned. She enjoys her business because she is able to earn an income to pay for her higher education, support the studies of her younger siblings, and cover the household expenses. By treating people in a friendly manner, Janeth has achieved a steady clientele. Her plans are to formalize her business and make it grow.

This will be her fifth loan with the MFP organization. She is very pleased to know that she will have financial support for advancing her business. Janeth feels comfortable with her Communal Bank because it is a unified and supportive group. The amount of 2,000 PEN that she requested will be invested in sewing materials such as thread, fabrics, elastics, and other supplies for making women's, men's, and children's clothes. This will help her buy at lower prices because she can make bulk purchases and pay with cash.

loans.use: to buy thread, fabrics, elastics, and other supplies for making clothes.

loans.name: Focion Tulio

texts.es:
Focion es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, sus ganas de salir adelante le ha permitido superar las dificultades y seguir progresando en su vida. Focion es un padre soltero de su hijo de 10 años, pues su madre los abandonó hace un tiempo y debido a esto se vio en la obligación de garantizar el sustento necesario para su hogar. En un momento se quedó desempleado y debido a la urgencia  de generar ingresos para su hogar buscó a unos amigos suyos que tenían sus propios negocios. Uno de ellos se dedicaba a la compra y venta de cosechas de verduras, y le enseñó la actividad a Focion para que se dedicara a esto. Focion trabajó para el como empleado durante un tiempo mientras aprendía en su totalidad como se manejaba el negocio, y una vez aprendida la actividad montó su propio negocio para generar sus propios ingresos. Desde entonces, Focion viene trabajando en su negocio de compra y venta de verduras en el cual compra las cosechas a los campesinos y las vende en la plaza de mercado de su municipio, y gracias a esta actividad genera los ingresos necesarios para su hogar. Con el ánimo de aprovechar algunos buenos precios, Focion busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de verduras al por mayor para ofrecerlas a sus clientes y así aprovechar los buenos precios de la temporada.

De esta manera, podrá acceder a precios bajos que se están ofreciendo en el momento y podrá tener un mayor margen de ganancia. Además, podrá seguir teniendo los ingresos que requiere para su hogar y su hijo tendrá acceso a una buena calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Focion has had to overcome much adversity in his life, but, as he is a hardworking and determined man, he has been able to face those challenges. Focion is a single father, and has a son who is 10 years old. His wife left them some time ago, and so Focion provides the only source of income for the family. At one time, Focion was out of work and was urgently seeking employment to provide for his son, so he worked temporarily as an employee for a couple of his friends who had businesses. His friends taught him their trades, and Focion learned how to run a business, which eventually led him to open his own business and to generate more income.

Since that time, Focion has made a living buying and selling vegetables. He buys produce from various farmers and then sells the products in the local market. Thanks to this work, he is able to make a living and provide for his son and home. In order to take advantage of seasonally low prices, Focion is requesting a loan that will allow him to purchase vegetables in bulk and offer them to his clients.

With these special wholesale prices, Focion will be able to garner a better margin from his resale of the products. The support from the loan will also allow him to continue making a decent wage and offer his son a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables in bulk for resale, and to take advantage of seasonally low prices.

loans.name: Liliana

texts.es:
Liliana se encuentra casada y tiene 3 hijos a quienes les ha querido ofrecer una buena educación. Debido a que los ingresos de su esposo no son suficientes para el sostenimiento de su hogar, Liliana se vio en la obligación de conseguir un empleo, y fue así como comenzó a trabajar como empleada doméstica en algunas casas. En una de ellas, se encontró con que una empleadora suya le enseñó a trabajar la actividad de la venta de productos de uso personal, y gracias a esto ha montado su propio negocio y lo viene trabajando en su tiempo libre; de esta manera genera ingresos adicionales para poder contribuir económicamente para el sostenimiento de su hogar, además de que así se paga sus estudios, pues está validando sus estudios de secundaria. Liliana de esta manera se ha encontrado con una mejor calidad de vida para ella y para su familia y por esto quiere seguir continuando con su negocio. Con el fin de aprovechar algunos precios de sus productos, Liliana busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de uso personal al por mayor para aprovechar los buenos precios de su proveedor y tener así un mayor margen de ganancia.

Liliana de esta manera podrá seguir ofreciendo buenos productos a sus clientes, a buenos precios y tener un buen margen de ganancia, con lo que sus ingresos aumentarán considerablemente y su familia podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida. Su sueño es seguir progresando con su familia, sacar sus 3 hijos adelante y terminar sus estudios de secundaria para estudiar alguna carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Liliana is married and is the mother of three children who she loves very much and for whom she wants to provide an education and bright future. As her husband’s wages are low and not sufficient to cover their household expenses, Liliana began working as a maid cleaning houses. In one of those homes, her employer taught her how to be a personal care products saleswoman. Thanks to that opportunity, Liliana started her own business, which she maintains in her free time. This retail business has allowed her to generate additional income for her home and studies, since she is completing her secondary school education. 

Liliana has found a way to increase the quality of life for herself and her family, and she wants to continue her retail business. Liliana is requesting a loan so that she can purchase personal care products in bulk and receive lower prices and greater profit margins.

Liliana wants to continue offering high quality products to her clients at good prices, and she desires to continue providing for her family’s needs. Her dream is to give her three children a good education, finish her own high school studies, and eventually pursue a career in a university.

loans.use: to purchase personal care products in bulk and take advantage of seasonally low prices from her product distributor.

loans.name: Sandra Ines

texts.es: Sandra es una persona muy luchadora que ha podido superar grandes adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida. Sandra se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos, de los cuales 1 de ellos en una hija que tiene una discapacidad y debe cuidar todo el tiempo. Desde el momento en que nació su hija con discapacidad, Sandra ha venido superando grandes obstáculos en su vida, los cuales le han enseñado a tener fortaleza y luchar siempre por lo que quiere. En una fundación donde contribuyen con el servicio de salud de su hija, Sandra aprendió la elaboración de artesanías como títeres, muñecos, bolsas de regalo, entre otros, y con el dinero que genera vendiendo estos productos puede comprar la droga que requiere su hija, ya que es bastante costosa. Es por esto que Sandra quiere que su negocio siga saliendo adelante y pueda seguir teniendo una fuente de ingresos con la cual pueda comprar el medicamento de su hija, por lo que busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de materias primas como telas, papeles, entre otros para la elaboración de sus artesanías, y seguir teniendo ingresos para pagar el costo de los medicamentos de su hija.
texts.en:
Sandra is a hardworking woman who has overcome many challenges in life. She is married and has a son and a daughter. Her daughter has a disability that requires full time care and supervision. From the day her daughter was born with this disability, Sandra has constantly been confronted with challenges and hardships. Over time, however, she has learned to persevere and always fight for what she needs.

Sandra learned to make crafts at a foundation that contributes to her daughter’s health care, and she currently works making and selling items such as puppets, dolls, gift bags and other crafts. With the money that she earns, Sandra is able to purchase the expensive medicine her daughter needs. She is requesting this loan in order to be able to purchase raw materials for making her crafts, such as fabric, paper and other items. Sandra works hard so that her daughter can receive proper care and medicine. Sandra’s daughter is her motivation to continue with her business and to continue generating income.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials such as fabric, paper, etc for making crafts, and to continue generating income to pay for her daughter's medical costs.

loans.name: Claudia Maria

texts.es:
Claudia ha tenido que superar muchas adversidades en su vida, pero gracias a sus ganas de trabajar y ganas de salir adelante ha podido superar estas dificultades y seguir progresando en su vida. Claudia es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de su hijo de 6 años debido a que se divorció de su esposo hace un tiempo, por tanto, Claudia debe garantizar unos ingresos en su hogar con los cuales pueda tener una buena calidad de vida para su hijo. Por enseñanza de su ex esposo aprendió el mantenimiento de computadores y montó un café Internet donde ofrece estos servicios a sus clientes. En su café Internet se ha caracterizado por ofrecer una buena atención a sus clientes y esto le ha permitido tener una gran clientela para su negocio. La gran ventaja con la que cuenta Claudia es que sabe realizar el mantenimiento de los equipos de su café Internet, por lo que no tiene que incurrir en altos costos para pagarle a alguna persona que le realice esta actividad. Aprovechando sus conocimientos, y debido a que requiere reparar un equipo de su café Internet, Claudia busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de los repuestos que requiere para realizar el mantenimiento de un equipo de su café Internet.

De esta manera su negocio seguirá prestando un buen servicio a sus clientes y así podrá seguir teniendo unos ingresos que le garanticen una buena calidad de vida. Claudia sueña con seguir teniendo un buen negocio y que este le permita en algún momento comprar una casa propia para ofrecerle a su hijo una mayor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Claudia has had to overcome many hardships in her life, but thanks to her strong work ethic and desire to get ahead, she has been able to meet those challenges and continue growing as a person. Claudia is a single mother of a 6-year-old son, and is the head of her family. She and her husband divorced some time ago, and therefore, she has to make a living to support her son. She learned computer maintenance from her ex-husband, and so she started up an internet café where she offers clients various services.

It is well known that Claudia is attentive to the needs of her customers, and that her café has a good atmosphere. She has a large client base and is very successful, since she is friendly and knows how to repair and maintain the computers and machines. Her technical knowledge allows her to keep her repair and maintenance costs down.

Claudia is requesting a loan that will allow her to purchase the necessary spare parts to repair a computer. She plans to utilize all her technical skills, but cannot complete successful repairs without the required replacement parts.

With the support from this loan she hopes to continue her business and her source of income for her family. Claudia’s dream is to grow and develop her business, and to one day buy her own house so that she can give her son a better quality of live and a better future.

loans.use: to purchase necessary parts for repairing computers at her internet cafe.

loans.name: Asuncion

texts.en:
Asuncion's business is sewing curtains and tablecloths as well as school and office uniforms. Her customers are mainly students and teachers. She's been in business for more than seven years and earns about 3000 PHP a month. She also raises hogs to sell for additional income.

Asuncion would like to improve her sewing services so she is asking for a loan of 15000 PHP to buy fabric, thread and needles. Part of the loan will also be used to maintain the hog raising business. She would like to have a stable source of income. 

Asuncion is now 44 years old and has four children, two of whom are attending school and in need of daily allowances. She hopes to give them the best education so they can to achieve a better way of living some day.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread and needles.

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en: Rosie is 39 years old and is married. She has been blessed with five children. Rosie lives in the village of Cutog Grande with her family. She has been involved in raising hogs for three years. She earns about PHP 7,000 per head. Rosie wants to raise more hogs but she lacks the necessary capital. In this regard, Rosie is requesting a loan amounting to PHP 35,000 to buy feed, vaccine and additional hogs to raise. Despite the hardships of life, she is striving hard to earn and save for education purposes.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccine and additional hogs to raise

loans.name: Araceli

texts.en:
Araceli lives with her husband and eight children. She is a hardworking individual who's very dedicated to her business. She has a piggery business and has been in operation for more than six years.

She wants to increase her sales and income to improve her family's living conditions. She's requesting a loan of 9000 PHP to buy feed and vitamins for her two current pigs. She hopes this will nourish them so she can sell them at a higher price.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her two pigs.

loans.name: Sergio Alberto

texts.es:
Sergio se encuentra casado y tiene 2 hijos de quienes manifiesta son su mayor motivación para trabajar fuertemente en su negocio. Sergio anteriormente trabajaba en una empresa de fabricación de calzado, sin embargo, cansado de tener tan baja remuneración por su trabajo decidió montar su propio negocio de fabricación de calzado. Además, su esposa también es muy emprendedora y decidió montar un negocio de videojuegos y venta de comidas rápidas, y gracias a estos dos negocios generan los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Sergio, gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos ha logrado captar una gran cantidad de clientes para su negocio, y esto le ha garantizado tener muy buenas ventas. Gracias a un gran pedido que tiene, Sergio busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de suela de caucho para la fabricación de un gran pedido que le han hecho.

De esta manera, Sergio podrá tener mayores ingresos y su familia podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y les podrá ofrecer mayores oportunidades económicas.
texts.en:
Sergio is married and has two children who are his greatest motivation to work hard on his business.  Sergio used to work in a shoe-making business, however, tired of receiving such low pay for his work he decided to start his own shoe-making business.  His wife is also very entrepreneurial and she decided to start a videogame business and to sell fast food.  Thanks to these two businesses they earn enough income to sustain their household expenses.  Sergio, thanks to the good quality of his products, has managed to get a large quantity of customers for his business and this has guaranteed very good sales.  Thanks to a large order that he has he is requesting a loan that will give him the opportunity to purchase rubber soles to manufacture this large order that has been made with him.  

In this way Sergio will be able to have better income and his family will be able to have a better quality of life and he can offer them better economic opportunities.

loans.use: to buy rubber soles for the manufacture of a large order.

loans.name: Johnard

texts.en:
Johnard sells fish and meat such as pork and chicken in his village. He is using his motorcycle to sell house to house. He also goes to the other village just to add to his sales and profit every day. He patiently does these activities because of his three children who are currently studying.

Now, he wants to increase his profit through adding more goods to offer but he has insufficient funds to purchase everything he wants to buy. For this reason, Johnard is asking for a loan of PHP 7,000 to buy fish and meat.

loans.use: to buy fish and meat

loans.name: Shazia's Group

texts.en:
Shazia, 34, is married and the mother of two young children who don’t attend school. Shazia is a very caring woman who stays at home as a housewife and does her household responsibilities. She is raising her children with great care and discipline. 
Her husband is an electrician by profession and operates an electric shop in the community market where he services electric items and provides repairing services to the customers. He is well-known among his customers for his work and good behavior. He has been operating his business for over eight years. 
Shazia has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. With the loan, he will buy electric items such as bulbs, tube lights and some repairing tools to help make his work more effective. Shazia is very hopeful that the loan would improve the financial position of her husband’s business.

loans.use: to buy electric items and repairing tools.

loans.name: Lailanie

texts.en: Lailanie, 42, is married and lives in the village of Santa Isabel, province of Isabela. Her farming business provides for her family. She is a hardworking mother and she makes sure she can meet the daily needs of her family. She is asking for a loan of PHP 21,000 to buy feed and vitamins for her pig. In the future, Lailanie hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her farming business.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en: Nenita, aged 51, stays at home for the welfare of her piggery business. She raises pigs and sell them after 4-5 months. This serves as her recreation from staying at home and yet she is still producing income through her business. However, she wishes her income was higher. To increase her profit, she is requesting a loan of PHP 6,000 to buy feeds, vitamins, and medicine. She hopes that her request would be approved in order to have better quality living conditions.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and medicine

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma is 48 years old and is married with four children. She has been involved in raising hogs for over two years. She earns about PHP 1,000 for each hog, a very minimal income. Norma wants her current hogs to be healthier and well-nourished.

Norma is requesting a loan of PHP 7,000 to buy feed and an additional hog to raise. She is enduing hardships in this business but still remains strong to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy feed and an additional hog to raise.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en: Lolita, 47, is a hardworking person who is raising children and operating a livestock business. She has chickens, ducks and pigs. Lolita is asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy vitamins and feed for her livestock. Lolita hopes that someday her business expands to meet all the needs of her family and also so she can renovate their house to have good living conditions.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and feed for her business.

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.en: Narcisa is 46 years old and married to Ronilo and has four grown children. Narcisa is a very diligent person and loving woman for her family. She runs a store that sells different products. She is asking for a loan of PHP 24,000 to buy additional products to sell in their village and increase her income so that she can sustain her family's daily needs.

loans.use: to buy spices, drinks and snack food for her store.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma a 47-year-old woman with three school-aged children from the village of Santa Isabel province of Isabela. She has been engaged in a hog raising business for 30 years. She is requesting a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy feed and piglets for her business in order to have additional income so that she can provide for the needs of her family. 

In the future, Vilma hopes that she can expand her business and renovate their house.

loans.use: to buy piglets and feed for her business

loans.name: Sergei

texts.en:
Sergei is a hardworking farmer from Ukraine. Two years ago, he was cultivating a ½ hectare of land. A year later, he was cultivating 1 hectare of land. Right now, he is working on 2 hectares of cultivated land. He was able to achieve this phenomenal rate of growth thanks to his supportive family, who work in the fields along with him. Sergei is especially thankful to his wife, who works full time as a nursing aide at a hospital and still manages to help Sergei out in the field. Her salary alone is not enough to sustain the family. 

Sergei's biggest dream is to send his kids, who are 8 and 12, to university. In order to achieve this, Sergei needs to cultivate more than 2 hectares of land. He has 11 hectares of land but he cannot utilize all of it because of the limited farm equipment he owns. His family needs you to help them finance motorized farming equipment, which will enable the family to realize their full potential by cultivating their entire 11 hectares of land. In the near future, Sergei is hoping to purchase a small tractor to expand the variety of his crop. Currently he is growing vegetables but, after he purchases a tractor, Sergei hopes to grow grapes as well.

loans.use: to buy motorized farming equipment.

loans.name: Lay

texts.en:
Lay (in the photo), age sixty-one, is a farmer. Her husband stays at home. She has two sons and one daughter. One has full-time employment, one is a security guard and another one is a soldier. The family lives in a village about eight kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Lay grows banana, papaya and mango. She is requesting her first loan of an amount of $700 to buy a motorbike for her son who is a security guard so he can get to work.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike for her son to get to work.

loans.name: Sothea

texts.en:
Sothea is 40 years old and lives with her 42-year-old husband, Sarin, in suburb of Phnom Penh. They have been married since 1993 and have two sons and one daughter. Two of their children are garment workers and the third attends school.  

Sothea sells vegetable and meat and her husband is a security guard. She is asking for her first loan of $1,500 to buy a motorbike for her children to get work.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike for her children to get work.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en: Adelaida, a very hardworking mother of four, is married to Romeo. They live in the village of Santa Isabel province of Isabela. She dreams that someday she can renovate their house and all her children can finish their studies. In that matter, Adelaida is asking for a loan of PHP 9,000 to buy feed and piglets for her hog raising business so that she can provide for the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and piglets for her business.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda, aged 50, is from Catugan. She is married and works as a vegetable merchant and hog fattening business owner. She has been operating these businesses for over three years and is happy about the positive impact on their living situation. Her spouse also helps her in managing these sources of income in order to lessen her burden.

She is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 15,000 to buy vegetables to sell such as string beans, squash, root crops, and feed. This loan will help her to increase her profit because she will be able to satisfy customer demand, thus generating more income.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for resale such as string beans, squash, root crops, and feed

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en: Carmelita a 38 years old woman with determination and patient in all aspect of her life. She is engaged in selling products such as rice and spices in the people of their village. Carmelita is asking a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy additional rice and spices to offer in their village. She hopes that her business expands so that she can provide for the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy rice and spices for her business.

loans.name: Lucely

texts.es:
Lucely es una persona muy luchadora que ha logrado superar grandes obstáculos que se le han presentado en su vida. Madre soltera cabeza de familia de 2 hijos de 15 y 17 años de edad, puesto que su esposo falleció hace aproximadamente 7 años, Lucely ha tenido que trabajar fuertemente todos los días para poder garantizar a sus hijos el sustento necesario para salir adelante y seguir progresando en su vida. Debido a que tenía que generar ingresos para su hogar, Lucely comenzó abriendo un negocio de venta de celulares, en el cual no le fue muy bien y luego de unos meses se vio en la obligación de cerrar. De allí, montó un negocio de venta de calzado, en el cual trabaja actualmente y el cual sigue creciendo gracias al empeño que le pone Lucely diariamente. En su negocio ha logrado tener muy buenas ventas, principalmente por la buena atención que ofrece, y esto le ha permitido que sus hijos puedan tener acceso a una buena educación. Debido a que su negocio ha ido creciendo, Lucely busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de legalizar su negocio pagando los registros necesarios y surtir su negocio con más calzado para la venta. 

De esta manera podrá tener menos inconvenientes a la hora de seguir comercializando sus productos y así podrá seguir creciendo cada vez más. Además, con mayores ingresos sus hijos podrán tener acceso a una educación universitaria que es el sueño de Lucely, el poder verlos hechos unos profesionales exitosos.
texts.en:
Lucely is truly a fighter who has been able to overcome great obstacles she has faced in her life.  She is a single mother and the head of her household of two children, who are 15 and 17, because of her husband's death seven years ago.  Lucely has had to work hard every day in order to ensure that her children have what they need to get ahead and keep making progress in their lives.  Because she had to generate income for her household, Lucely started out by opening a business selling cell phones, which did not go very well for her.  After a few months she had to close it.  Next, she opened a business selling shoes, which she currently works at and which is still growing, thanks to the effort Lucely puts in every day.  She has achieved good sales in her business, mainly because of her good customer service, and this has allowed her children to have access to a good education.  As her business has been growing, Lucely is looking for a loan to give her the opportunity to legalize her business by paying for the necessary registration and to stock her business with more shoes to sell.

This will allow her to have fewer problems when it comes to continuing to sell her products and will thus allow her to keep growing more and more.  Also, greater income will allow her children to have access to a college education, which is Lucely's dream--to be able to see them become successful professionals.

loans.use: to legalize her business by paying for the necessary registration and to stock her business with more shoes to sell

loans.name: Sareun

texts.en:
Sareun is a 60-year-old construction worker. His 58-year-old wife, Seun, stays at home and does housework. The elderly couple has been married since 1972 and have three daughters, two are garment workers and the third is in school. They live in a suburb of Phnom.

Sareun is requesting his first loan of $1,500 to buy a motorbike for commuting.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Yasmina

texts.en:
Yasmina is a 51-year-old married woman from Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan and a mother of two children.

Yasmina has a home-based project where she sells blankets and clothes and is requesting a loan of 600 JD to purchase more quantities for trading purposes.

Yasmina is looking to purchase a house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase blankets and clothes for trading purposes

loans.name: Misbah's Group

texts.en:
Misbah, aged-36 years, is married and has three children. All of her children are getting an education. To be able to afford the education expenses of her children, Misbah does sewing works. She wants to give her children a good education so they can secure their future and make their parents proud. Misbah works with great dedication and her family respects and loves her a lot for her efforts. 

Misbah's husband is a carpenter by profession. He makes furniture on orders and generates income for the family. Her brother in law also lives with her family and he is involved in a sweets sales business. His products are very famous amongst children. He sells Gachak (made with sugar and topping of almonds, peanuts) and sweet noodles. He makes good sales from his products. 

Misbah has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her brother in law’s business. He will invest the loan in buying required material such as sugar, cooking oil, dried fruits, etc. in larger quantities for making the products of better a quality to sell. 

Misbah is hopeful that her brother in law’s business will become more fruitful after the loan investment.

loans.use: to buy required material for sweets sales business.

loans.name: Aurenila

texts.en: To earn her living, Aurenila raises livestock. The main source of income for the business comes from raising pigs to sell. She decided to establish her business in order to generate income instead of just lazing at home and doing household chores. She is 45 years old and she has three children. She would like to expand her business, but she has insufficient funds. Therefore she is asking for a loan of PHP 45,000 to buy vitamins, vaccines, and feed for the sustenance and proper growth of her hogs. She hopes this loan will be granted as it is her only chance to improve her business and her family's lives as well.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, vaccines, and feed for the sustenance and proper growth of her hogs.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en: Lydia's primary source of income is her general store business. She is 57 years old and is married with one child. Her husband's name is Gilbert. He is a farmer in their village, where they generate their income. Lydia has been engaged in her sari-sari store for ninth months and she earns about PHP 300 a day. She wants to restock her retail store but she lacks the necessary capital. In this regard, Lydia is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 8,000 to buy canned goods, noodles, assorted bread, candies and soft drinks to sell. She hopes that in the future, she will make her business grow as she continues to manage her business well.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, assorted bread, candies, and soft drinks to sell

loans.name: Kaneez Fatima's Group

texts.en:
Kaneez Fatima, aged 47-years, married with three children.

Kaneez is a very caring housewife. She stays at home and manages the household works. She takes care of her family and tries her best to provide comfort to her family by fulfilling their needs. Her husband runs a canteen where he sells food items such as biscuits, chips, cold drinks, etc. to his customers and earns on profits. He makes good sales, which allows him to put three meals on the table for the family. 

Kaneez has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. He will invest the loan in buying more edible items, in larger quantities, to put in his canteen for reselling. Kaneez is very sure that her husband’s income will be increased after the loan investment.

loans.use: to buy eatable items for canteen business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy staple items to stock his business and thereby offer a greater variety of products to his customers

loans.name: Khawlah

texts.en:
Khawla is a conservative woman who she is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her husband.

Khawla is 45 years old and married. She lives in Irbid, Jordan and she is a mother of three children.

Khawla is looking to have a loan of 500 JD so she can buy more stationary and a camera.

loans.use: to buy stationary and a camera

loans.name: Sultan

texts.en:
Sultan is a 43-year-old married man form Idon, Irbid, Jordan and a father of five children.

Sultan has a mobile phone devices shop. He is requesting a loan of 1,000 JD to purchase more mobile phone devices for trading purposes.

Sultan is looking to improve his business and establish another branch.

loans.use: to purchase mobile phone devices to sell

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 2 hijos, pues su padre murió hace aproximadamente 6 años, dejando a Rosa viuda y a cargo de todas las obligaciones de su hogar. A pesar de esto, Rosa ha tenido mucha fortaleza para salir adelante con su familia y brindarles a sus hijos todo lo necesario, y gracias a esta fortaleza ha podido ir progresando poco a poco. En un principio, Rosa se dedicaba a las actividades del campo gracias a que sus padres se las enseñaron desde muy temprana edad, y posteriormente junto con su esposo siguió llevando a cabo estas actividades. Actualmente, Rosa se sigue dedicando a las actividades del campo, pues tiene 2 vacas lecheras las cuales ordeña y vende la leche al carro recolector que pasa diariamente por su vereda. Ahora que Rosa quiere seguir progresando, busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de dos vacas lecheras para aumentar su capacidad de producción y por ende aumentar sus ingresos.

De esta manera, su familia podrá tener acceso a unas mejores oportunidades económicas y por ende a una mejor calidad de vida. Además, sus 2 hijos podrán tener acceso a una educación de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Rosa is a single mother of two children whose father died approximately six years ago leaving Rosa a widow and in charge of all of the obligations of her household.  In spite of this, Rosa has had great strength in order to get ahead with her family and give her children everything they need.  Thanks to this strength she has been able to make progress, little by little.  From early on, Rosa worked in the countryside thanks to her parents who taught her this work from a very young age.  Later she continued working in these activities alongside her husband.  Currently, Rosa continues working in this area.  She has two milk cows which she milks and sells the milk to the collection car which passes along her road every day.  Now that Rosa wants to continue to make progress she is requesting a loan that will give her the opportunity to buy two milk cows to increase her production capacity and thus increase her income.

In this way her family will have access to better economic opportunities and thus a better quality of life.  Also, her children will be able to have access to a better quality education.

loans.use: to buy two milk cows to increase her production capacity and to increase her income.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is 46 years old and married with five children. She lives in Irbid, Jordan.

Mariam is looking to have a loan of 500 JD to buy and sell cosmetics from her home.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Kholoud

texts.en:
Kholoud is a 42-year-old married woman from Sahab, Jordan and a mother of three children.

Kholoud has a distingusished home-based business where she sells eggs. Now she is requesting a loan of 600 JD to purchase new egg incubators.

Kholoud is looking to improve her business so that she can increase her income and provide her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase egg incubators for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a button machine and a flat machine to be able to keep developing her workshop and keep making profits.

loans.name: Perlita

texts.en:
Perlita is a responsible housewife, and she has found a way of creating extra income. She runs a business raising pigs to sell. She has done this for almost two years, and earns a profit of 7,000 Philippines Pesos (PHP) per head sold. She uses this income for food, clothing and allowances for her two children.

Perlita would like to expand her business, but needs extra capital to do this.  She is asking for a loan of 15,000 PHP to buy pig feed, vaccinations and additional pigs to raise. Perlita plans to continue to to manage her business well, and believes that the loan will help her to improve and grow her business.

loans.use: to buy pig feed, vaccinations and additional pigs to raise

loans.name: Montaha

texts.en:
Montaha is a convservative woman who is unwilling to upload a photo on the internet. The photo is of her husband.

Montaha is 31 years old and married with one child. She in Idon, Irbid, Jordan.

Montaha is looking to have a loan of 500 JD to buy and sell food, which will make her income increase.

loans.use: to buy food to sell in her store

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.es:
Gabriel es una persona que a tenido que atravesar por muchas dificultades en su vida, sin embargo, sus ganas de trabajar y salir adelante le han permitido superarlas y continuar progresando junto a su familia. Gabriel se encuentra casado y tiene 4 hijos y hace aproximadamente 3 meses fue despedido de su empleo, quedando sin la única fuente de ingresos con la que contaba su familia para poder pagar los gastos de su hogar. De forma individual aprendió la preparación de chorizos y chuzos y posteriormente se consiguió un carrito donde ofrece estos alimentos, y ahora sale todos los días por las calles de su municipio con el ánimo de vender sus alimentos para poder generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. En este negocio le ha ido muy bien, sin embargo las dificultades no desaparecen, pues una noche cuando regresaba a su hogar luego de trabajar todo el día fue robado y el dinero de ese día se perdió por completo. A pesar de todo esto sigue trabajando fuertemente para poder sacar su familia adelante. Es por esto que busca que un préstamo le permita comprar una nevera, un fogón de gas e insumos para la preparación de sus comidas, y así ir creciendo poco a poco en su negocio.

De esta manera podrá ofrecer mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes y sus ventas aumentarán considerablemente. Además, con mayores ingresos su familia podrá gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Gabriel is someone who has had to get through many difficult times in his life but despite this his motivation to work hard and get ahead has allowed him to overcome them and continue moving forward with his family.  Gabriel is married and has four children.  About three months ago he was laid off from his job, leaving his family without the only source of income they had for paying their household expenses.  On his own he learned how to prepare chorizo (sausages) and chuzos (grilled, skewered meat) and later he acquired a food cart where he sells these foods and now goes out every day to the streets of his town hoping to sell his food in order to earn the income needed to sustain his household.  This business has gone well for him, however, the difficulties haven’t disappeared.  One night as he returned to his house after working all day he was robbed and lost all of the money from that day.  In spite of all this he continues working hard to get ahead with his family.  This is why he is requesting a loan that will allow him to buy a refrigerator, a gas burner, and supplies to prepare his food and continue growing his business little by little.  

In this way he will be able to offer better variety of products to his customers and his sales will increase considerably.  Also, with better income his family can enjoy a better quality of life and greater economic opportunities in the future.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator, a gas burner, and supplies for food preparation to gradually grow his business.

loans.name: Paula Liliana

texts.es:
Paula aprendió la actividad de la crianza de cerdos desde muy temprana edad, pues su abuelo se dedicaba a esta actividad y se la enseñó desde muy joven, y gracias a esto Paula adquirió una gran experiencia. En un principio Paula trabajaba junto con su abuelo en la crianza de los cerdos, pero cuando murió Paula decidió montar su propio negocio para generar sus propios ingresos. Actualmente Paula se sigue dedicando a esta actividad y gracias a esta ha logrado formar una familia con 2 hijos de 3 años y 15 meses de nacido, y con su venta de cerdos genera ingresos con los cuales contribuye al sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Gracias a que tiene muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes, Paula busca que un préstamo le permita comprar el alimento necesario para la crianza de los cerdos, y así poder ofrecerlos a sus clientes de buena calidad.

De esta manera Paula logrará vender sus cerdos a un buen precio y sus ingresos podrán ofrecerle a ella y a su familia una buena calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas. Paula sueña con tener un gran negocio y seguir creciendo para que junto con su familia puedan seguir progresando y asegurar un futuro económico estable.
texts.en:
Paula learned to work raising pigs from a very young age as her grandfather did this work and taught her from when she was very young.  Thanks to this, Paula gained a lot of experience.  Early on Paula worked together with her grandfather raising pigs but when he died Paula decided to start her own business to earn her own income.  Currently Paula continues to work at this and thanks to this work has been able to start a family with two children who are three-years-old and 15 months.  Wish her pig sales she earns income which she contributes to the household expenses thanks to having good orders from her customers.  Paula is requesting a loan that will allow her to buy the feed she needs to care for the pigs so that she can offer a good quality product to her customers.  

In this way Paula will be able to sell her pigs for a good price and her income will provide Paula and her family with a good quality of life and better financial opportunities.  Paula dreams of having a large business and of continuing to grow it so that alongside her family she can continue getting ahead and assure a financial future for them.

loans.use: to buy the feed needed for raising pigs to be able to offer customers a better quality product.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is 60 years old, and is a very industrious woman. She is running a vegetable resale business, and also raises pigs. She cares for the pigs when she isn't able to sell vegetables in the market.  These activities are her ways of helping her family to improve their poor living standard.    

Imelda is asking for financial support from ASKI to improve the lives of her family members.  Her loan of 6,000 Philippines Pesos (PHP) will be used to purchase vegetables, such as eggplant and beans, and also pig feed. She wants the loan so she can increase her income, and secure a more comfortable lifestyle for her family.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, such as eggplants and beans, and pig feed

loans.name: Nelia

texts.en:
Nelia lives with her family in the village of Pulay, in the Philippines. She is married to Linberto, a farmer in their village. The couple is thankful, because they have been blessed with three children. 

Pig raising is Neila's primary source of income. Nelia has been busy managing the pig-raising business for 15 years, and she earns about 7,000 Philippines Pesos (PHP) per head sold. Nelia is now requesting a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy feed, vaccines and vitamins for the proper care of her pigs. She hopes to improve her pig raising business to earn a higher income.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccines and vitamins for the proper care of her pigs

loans.name: Barrio El Riito Group

texts.es:
El grupo "Barrio el Riito" esta conformado por siete mujeres las cuales son muy trabajadoras y responsables es la primera vez  que estan en el grupo y trabajando con la institucion, el nombre del grupo lo han elegido ellos porque se encuentran cercas de un riito pequeño que tiene agua cristalina agua que la comunidad aprovecha para tomar.
Esta vez han elegido como representante del grupo a Doña Pilar quien ha quedado como la representante del grupo ella tiene 27 años de edad por el momento esta viviendo en union libre desde hace dos años con sus pareja Alvaro con quien tiene 1 niño aun no asite a la escuela sin embargo le gusta mucho saber que cada vez le hace falta muy poco para que valla a la escuela. Doña Pilar tiene una tienda de abarrotes esta vez ha solicitado el credito para surtise ya que le hacen falta varias cosas, como productos enlatados, leche, pan, huevo, detergentes entre otras cosas. Su tienda no tiene ningun nombre ya que tiene poco tiempo escasamente dos años, el reto mas grande que tiene que atravesar doña Pilar es la falta de recursos para adquirir mas producto ya que tiene mucha competencia y si no tiene bien surtida la tienda es muy dificil que le lleguen los clientes a su negocio.
Nos comenta que la tienda la inicio ya que su pareja muchas veces se queda sin trabajo y de algun modo tenian que empezar un negocio donde les dejara recursos economicos para mejorar su calidad de vida y lo que mas le gusta de su negocio es darle un buen trato a los clientes.
La meta que tiene Pilar es que su tienda pueda estenderse y llegar a ser un minisuper todo esto lo hace para poder mejorar su calidad de vida de ella y su familia, la señora Pilar y el resto del grupo estan muy agradecidao ya que podran invertir en sus actividades, Teresa comprara pollitos y borregos, Luisa comprara borregos, Anita comprara Maiz para animales, Rosaura comprara guajolotes, Dionicia y Elodia comprara pollos y guajolotes.
texts.en:
The group "Barrio El Riito" consists of seven hardworking and responsible women who are working together as a group with Fundación Realidad for the first time. They chose the name for their group because they live near a small river that provides crystal-clear drinking water for the community. On this occasion, the members elected Doña Pilar to be the group representative. She is currently 27 years of age and has been in a common-law relationship for two years with her partner Alvaro. They have a son who does not attend school even though he enjoys learning. However, they lack the funds to send him to school.

Doña Pilar has a grocery store, so she is requesting a loan to restock her business with products she is lacking such as canned goods, milk, bread, eggs, detergents, and other items. Her store does not have a name, but it has been in existence for barely two years. The greatest challenge she faces is not having the resources to acquire more products. There is plenty of competition, so if her store does not have enough stock, it is very difficult for her business to attract customers. Pilar says she started her store because her partner lost his job some time ago. Somehow she found the means to start a business so that she could generate income to improve her quality of life. What she enjoys most about her business is being able to provide good service to her customers. Pilar's goal is to expand her store and turn it into a mini-supermarket with the intention of improving her quality of life and that of her family.

Sra. Pilar and the rest of her group are extremely grateful that they can invest in their businesses: • Teresa will buy baby chickens and lambs. • Luisa will buy lambs. • Anita will buy corn for her animals. • Rosaura will buy turkeys. • Dionicia and Elodia will buy chickens and turkeys.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, milk, bread, eggs, and other products.

loans.name: Femer

texts.en: Femer works raising pigs, a business she started several years ago. She started raising pigs and as they grew she’d sell them. The best way to earn profits was to go to the free livestock markets to buy and sell pigs. Now, she needs to expand her business and this is why she’s taking out her loan amounting to PHP 20,000 to buy feed, vaccine and additional hogs to raise. This business helps Femer because it’s the only source of income she has to raise her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccine and additional hogs to raise

loans.name: Noel

texts.en: Noel is a modest person with a strong personality. He lives with his family in the village of Pulay. Noel is engaged in a hog-raising business that primarily involves hogs for breeding. It is a business he started several years ago. As of now, he needs to increase his business, and this is why he is taking out a loan of 30,000 PHP that he will use to buy feed, vaccines, and additional hogs to raise. This business helps Noel, because it's the only source of income he has to support his family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccines, and additional hogs to raise

loans.name: Marcelo

texts.en: Marcelo is 52 years old, and is married to Dolores. They live in the town of Cabatuan in the province of Isabela. He has been engaged in a hog-raising business that primarily raises hogs for breeding. He usually receives an income amount of PHP 7,000 per head. Marcelo wants to raise more hogs, but he has insufficient capital. Therefore, he is requesting a loan in the amount of PHP 30,000 to buy feed, vaccine and vitamins for the proper growth of his hogs. He believes that he can improve the business through his patience and strong determination.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccine and vitamins for the proper growth of his hogs

loans.name: Marina

texts.en: Marina is 54 years old, married with four grown children. She is a very responsible mother. She sells different vegetables and fruits in their village. She hopes that someday she can build her own stall in front of their house. She is asking for a loan of PHP 7,000 to buy additional vegetables and fruits that she can offer for sale in their village to have additional income to sustain the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy squash, eggplant, onions and garlic for her business

loans.name: Ray

texts.es: Ray, de 43 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y empeñoso, además de alegre y sociable. Es conviviente con Delia quien es ama de casa y madre de sus 4 hijos, Jack de 20, Pitter de 16, Clar de 8 y Jamilet de 7 años de edad a quienes desea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Vive en compañía de su pareja y sus hijos, instalados cómodamente en su casa propia. El negocio que tiene Ray en una tienda de ventas de repuestos para motos y motocarros, además de dar servicio de vulcanizado; comprar y vender vehículos menores de segundo uso, contando para eso con un local propio acondicionado en su casa ubicada en una avenida muy transitada de la ciudad de Pucallpa, donde atiende muy servicialmente a sus clientes. Se inició con un capital propio  hace más de 5  años, además cuenta con el apoyo de su pareja y sus hijos quienes le ayudan en la atención al publico. Considera su negocio bastante rentable por la demanda que tiene sus productos, por el constante crecimiento del parque vehicular de motos y motocarros. Le gusta su negocio pues fue concebido por una idea propia logrando verlo concretizado y viendo los buenos resultado que tiene está logrando aumentar sus ingresos  e ir creciendo como empresario por tanto tiene planes de ampliar y comprase maquinas necesarias para dar servicio de torno. Este será el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecido por contar con una línea de crédito para avanzar con su negocio, se compromete a cumplir con los pagos para así tener un buen record crediticio. Además comenta sentirse cómodo con su banco comunal pues considera  a sus miembros ser personas responsables. Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en su negocio en la compra de un mototaxi de segundo uso valorizado en 900 nuevos soles al cual lo repotenciarà y lo pondrá a la venta. Además de repuestos de motos.
texts.en:
Ray, age 43, is a hardworking and industrious gentleman. He is also cheerful and sociable. Ray is in a common-law relationship with Delia, who is a homemaker and the mother of their four children: Jack (age 20), Pitter (age 16), Clar (age 8), and Jamilet (age 7). He wants to provide them a better quality of life. Ray lives comfortably with his partner and chilldren in their own home. He has a retail shop where he sells spare parts for motorcycles and motorcycle taxis. Ray also provides tire repair services and buys and sells small secondhand vehicles. In order to provide these services, he set aside suitable space at his house which is located on a very busy street in the city of Pucallpa. This spot is where he is able to offer service to his customers. Ray started his business more than five years ago with his own capital. He also has the support of his partner and children, who help with attending to the customers. Ray considers his business to be profitable because there is demand for his products as a result of the growing number of motorcycles and motorcycle taxis. He enjoys his business because he came up with the idea, took action to implement it, and achieved good results. His income has increased and he has grown as an entrepreneur. Ray has plans to expand and buy the necessary machines for providing lathing services.

This will be his fourth loan with the MFP organization. He is grateful to access a line of credit for advancing his business. Ray promises to complete his payments, which is demonstrated by his good credit record. In addition, he feels comfortable working with his Communal Bank because he considers the members to be responsible people. The amount of 1,500 PEN that he requested will be invested in his business. Ray will buy a secondhand motorcycle taxi valued at 900 PEN that he will refurbish for resale. He will also buy motorcycle parts.

loans.use: to buy a secondhand motorcycle taxi and spare parts.

loans.name: Seham

texts.en:
Seham is 53 years old and a widow. She lives in Irbid, Jordan and she is a mother of two children.

Seham is looking to have a loan of 300 JD to improve her house and her living conditions.

loans.use: to improve her house

loans.name: Olivia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Olivia se encuentra casada y tiene 4 hijos a quienes les ha querido ofrecer una buena calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas. Olivia tiene una tienda general desde hace aproximadamente 1 año donde ofrece productos de la canasta familiar, snack y dulces a sus clientes. La tienda la abrió debido a que los ingresos que generaba su esposo ya no eran suficientes para poder sostener todos los gastos de su hogar, y de esta manera ha logrado tener mayores ingresos con los cuales puede ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar. Debido a que su tienda la abrió con muy bajo capital, Olivia busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar y así surtir mejor su tienda.

Olivia espera que de esta manera sus clientes aumenten considerablemente, pues podrán encontrar una mayor variedad de productos en su tienda. Además, Olivia espera que con el crecimiento de su tienda pueda ir cumpliendo poco a poco su sueño de salir adelante con sus hijos y algún día tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Olivia is married and has four children for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life and better financial opportunities. For approximately one year, she has managed a general store where she offers household products, snacks, and sweets to her customers. Olivia opened her store because the income generated by her husband was not enough to maintain all of the household expenses. By earning additional income, she is able to provide her family a better quality of life and greater economic opportunities to make progress. She started her store with very little capital. Olivia seeks to access a loan so that she can acquire household products to restock her store.

She hopes that her customer base will increase considerably as a result of offering a wider variety of products in her store. In addition, Olivia would like to see her store grow so that she can gradually fulfill her dream of seeing her children succeed and of having a house of her own someday.

loans.use: to buy household products to sell in her store.

loans.name: Ruzanna

texts.en: Ruzanna is from the village of Arevshat in the Shirak region of Armenia.  She is married with two sons (twenty-three and twenty-four years old).  Ruzanna has a high school education and has been farming for the past twenty years.  She considers herself a hardworking, honest person.  She is looking for a loan to purchase potato and barley seeds and fertilizer.  Her investment should increase the family income by fifteen percent.  In addition, Ruzanna keeps her debt below twenty percent of the equity in her business.  She is pleased with the services of microfinance and hopes to continue expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase potato and barley seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Sofya

texts.en: Sofya is from the village of Voghji in the Shirak region of Armenia.  She is married with two sons (seventeen and nineteen years old).  Sofya has a high school education and has been farming for the past nineteen years.  She also supports her relatives living in the city with produce grown on the family farm.  Sofya would like to expand her business.  She is looking for a loan to purchase two calves.  With this investment, she expects her family income to increase by twenty percent.  She hopes to keep growing her business and save some money to construct a new family home.

loans.use: to purchase two calves

loans.name: Armine

texts.en: Armine is from the city of Gyumri in the Shirak region of Armenia.  She is single and has a college education.  She is a designer of home furnishings and has been in this business for twelve years.  Armine supports her parents and her sister’s family.  She is a hardworking, ambitious person and would like to grow her business.  She is looking for a loan to buy materials to expand her types of products.  Armine expects this investment to increase her income by twenty percent.  She would like to continue expanding her business and purchase her own store.  She is pleased with the quality of microfinance services.

loans.use: to purchase material to increase her product lines

loans.name: Ekhlas

texts.en:
Ekhlas is a conservative woman who is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her husband.

Ekhlas is 43 years old, married and the mother of four children. She lives in Idon, Irbid, Jordan.

Ekhlas is looking to have a loan of 400 JD to she can expand her sales in her grocery store.

loans.use: to buy grocery items to sell

loans.name: Silvard

texts.en: Silvard is from the village of Arapy in the Shirak region of Armenia.  She is married with two sons (twenty-seven and twenty-eight years old).  Silvard has a college education and has been engaged as a farmer for the past twenty-five years.  She also supports her relatives with produce grown on the family farm.  Silvard is a hardworking, honest person.  She is looking for a loan to purchase potato seeds, fertilizer and some piglets.  Silva expects this investment to increase the family income by fifteen percent.  She is pleased with the services of microfinance, especially as loan collections are conducted in her village.

loans.use: to purchase potato seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Ruzanna

texts.en: Ruzanna is from the village of Gharibjanyan in the Shirak region of Armenia.  She is married with three children: a thirty-three-year-old daughter and two sons (thirty and thirty-six years old).  Ruzanna has a high school education and has been farming for the past thirty years.  She considers herself a hardworking, honest person and is looking to grow her business.  She would like a loan to purchase potato and barley seeds and fertilizer.  According to her business plan, this investment will increase the family income by forty percent.  Ruzanna keeps her business debt under twenty percent of the equity in her business.  She is pleased with the services of microfinance.

loans.use: to purchase potato and barley seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.en: Svetlana is from the village of Arevshat in the Shirak region of Armenia.  She is married with two children – a twenty-two-year-old daughter and a twenty-one-year-old son.  Svetlana has a high school education and has been farming for the past fifteen years.  She dreams for her children to have happy lives and looks forward to being a grandmother.  Svetlana is also keen to expand her business.  She is looking for a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer and fuel.  According to her plan, this investment will increase the family income by eighteen percent.  Svetlana was born in Arevshat and enjoys the rural life surrounded by family and friends.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer and fuel

loans.name: Noofa

texts.en:
Noofa is 61 years old and married with one child. She lives in Madaba, Jordan.

Noofa is looking to have a loan of 900 JD in order to buy foodstuff to sell from her home store.

loans.use: to buy foodstuff to sell in her store

loans.name: Hana

texts.en:
Hana is a conservative person who is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet so the man in the photo is her husband.

Hana is a 53-year-old married woman from Baqa'a, Jordan and a mother of two children.

Hana has a remarkable business. She sells Italian goods. Because of the high inflation in gold prices in Jordan, many of the women are unable to purchase it, especially those who about to get married. Thus, a growing business has appeared: selling Italian gold, which is less expensive. Hana is requesting a loan of 600 JD to purchase more Italian gold for trading purposes.

Hana is looking to purchase a house for her family instead of their current rented one.

loans.use: to purchase Italian gold to sell

loans.name: Hrachik

texts.en: Hrachik is from the village of Shirak in the Shirak region of Armenia.  He is married with four children: two daughters (thirty-four and thirty-seven years old) and two sons (twenty-nine and thirty-nine years old).  He is a trained mechanic and has been working on the family farm for the past eighteen years.  Hrachik is a hardworking, respected person in Shirak.  His oldest children are happily married and he is looking forward to his youngest son getting married.  He is looking for a loan to purchase potato and barley seeds and fertilizer.  According to Hrachik’s plan, this investment will increase the family income by thirty percent.  Hrachik is careful with his debt.  He keeps his loans to less than twenty percent of the equity in his business.  He is satisfied with the services of microfinance.

loans.use: to purchase potato and barley seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Taguhi

texts.en: Taguhi is from the village of Marmashen in the Shirak region of Armenia.  She is married with four children: three daughters (seventeen, twenty and twenty-two years old) and a ten-year-old son.  Taguhi has a high school education and has been farming for the past eight years.  Previously she was employed as a laboratory assistant.  Taguhi dreams of renovating the family home and having all her children graduate from university.  She is looking for a loan to purchase potato and barley seeds and fertilizer.  According to her plans, this investment will increase the family income by thirty percent.  She will continue to save money for her children, expand her business, and help support her relatives.  Taguhi appreciates the services of microfinance.

loans.use: to purchase potato and barley seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is a very determined and patient person with three adult children, from Alibagu, province of Isabela. She is engaged in managing a community based store. To meet the needs of her family she is asking for a loan of PHP 7,000 to buy additional products that she can offer in their village so that she can have additional income and provide for her family.

In the future, Rosita hopes that her business will expand so that she can meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy rice, coffee, shampoo, noodles and snack foods for her store

loans.name: Salha

texts.en:
Salha is a 26-year-old single lady from Al Russeifeh, Jordan.

Salha is looking to improve her family's living conditions so she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to do maintenance on her family house.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her house

loans.name: Abdoul El Mazid

texts.fr: Monsieur Abdoul El Mazid  habite au Sénégal. Il est âgé de 37 ans. Il est célibataire  et évolue depuis 5 ans dans le secteur du commerce.  Il vend des habits, chaussures et accessoires  de femmes. C’est une activité qu’elle  a choisi par nécessité afin  de gagner des revenus qui lui permettent de subvenir à ses besoins personnels mais aussi d’aider ses parents. Il est membre d’un des guichets  de l’U-IMCEC  ou il a déjà remboursé  2 prêts  antérieurs. Il sollicite un  crédit de 300 000 frs  prévu pour l’achat de marchandises qu’il commercialise. Son objectif est de développer son activité de commerce, renforcer  les  revenus qu’il gagne,  pour ainsi pouvoir satisfaire  ses besoins particuliers et  en meme temps  améliorer ses conditions de vie économique et sociale.
texts.en:
Abdoul El Mazid lives in Senegal.  He is 37 years old, single, and has been involved in retail business for the past five years.  He sells clothes, shoes and accessories for women.  This is an activity he has chosen out of necessity in order to earn an income which allows him to meet his own needs and also support his parents.

He is a member of one of the branches of UIMCEC and he has already repaid two previous loans.  He is requesting a loan of 300,000 francs for the purchase of merchandise that he will resale.  His goal is to expand his retail business and increase his income, in order to meet his own needs and improve his economic and social living conditions.

loans.use: to buy clothes and accessories for resale.

loans.name: Hanaa

texts.en:
Hanaa is 34 years old, divorced and the mother of two children. She lives in Al Khaledieh, Al Mafraq, Jordan.

Hanaa is looking to have a loan of 400 JD so she can buy furniture for her house.

loans.use: to buy furniture

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 41 years old. She is married and has two school-aged children. Gemma has a retail shop where she sells a variety of different products in the local community. She has had this business for ten years. 

Gemma is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy shampoo, soap, canned goods and noodles to sell. Each month, she earns about 4,000 PHP doing this type of work. Aside from the grocery store, she and her spouse have a motorcycle that provides them with additional income. Her spouse manages the motorcycle.

In the future, Gemma hopes that her business will improve so that she will be able to provide for the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, soap, canned goods and noodles to sell.

loans.name: Florida

texts.en: Florida is a 54-year-old woman married to Sadili, with five grown children. They live in Alibagu, province of Isabela. Florida manages a store which is located in front of their house. In the future, Florida hopes that her business will expand so that she can meet the needs of her children.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, snack food and spices for her store

loans.name: Kawthar

texts.en:
Kawthar is 37 years old and a mother of six children. She lives in Al Hashmi, Jordan.

Kawthar is looking to have a loan of 700 JD to improve her living conditions by fixing her home.

loans.use: to fix and improve her house

loans.name: Najah

texts.en:
Najah is a conservative person who is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet. Thus, the man in the photo is her husband.

Najah sells home appliances and she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase more quantities for trading purposes. Najah is looking to establish a shop for her business instead of working from her house.

loans.use: to purchase home appliances to sell

loans.name: Yuldoshboi

texts.ru: Юлдошбой добрый и честный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих несовершеннолетних детей. Более 10 лет занимается выращиванием картошки и пшеницы. Юлдошбой хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль. Он мечтает построить небольшой дом для своей семьи. Он запрашивает займ для покупки минеральных удобрений и скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Yuldoshboi is a kind and honest man. He is married and has three young children. He has been cultivating potatoes and wheat for more than ten years. Yuldoshboi wants to expand his business and receive a good profit. He dreams about building a small house for his family. He is asking for a loan to buy mineral fertilizer and cattle. He hopes for your help and generosity.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and cattle.

loans.name: Fatemah

texts.en: Fatemah is 32 years old and single. She lives in Irbid, Jordan. Fatemah is looking to have a loan of 400 JD, which will help her to expand her work in cosmetics sales so she can open her own store in the future.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy different spare parts for cars

loans.name: Amal

texts.en: Amal, 39 years old, is a single lady. To be able to support herself, Amal started her own business two years ago by opening a clothing retail business selling ladies and kids clothes. Now Amal has applied for this loan to bring in a spring and summer collection to the store.

loans.use: to buy the spring and summer clothing collection

loans.name: Sahar

texts.en:
Sahar, 23 years old, is single. She has four brothers and two sisters.
