Sahar is a university student majoring in anthropology in a governmental university. She has applied for this loan to pay for her last semester and move on with the graduation process.

loans.use: to pay for her last semester

loans.name: Bakary

texts.fr:
Monsieur Bakary est un homme marié de 28 ans et père de 1 enfant. Il vit avec sa femme et son enfant dans le quartier Faraba de Bougouni.
N’ayant pas été à l’école moderne, très jeune il commença les activités génératrices de revenus notamment l’achat et la vente des pneus et le collage des chambre à air et pneus. Pour renforcer davantage son activité il décide d’associer à son activité de collage et la vente des pneus, l’achat et la vente des pièces détachées.
Avec une expérience de 10 années, il maîtrise son activité.
Pour agrandir sa boutique Monsieur Bakary décide de prendre un prêt avec Soro Yiriwaso pour acheter, 30 pneus, 9 batteries, 3 trousseaux de clé 20 chambres à air à Bamako. Il s’approvisionne à Bamako Capitale de la République du Mali.
 La vente se fait dans sa boutique et sa clientèle est composée pour la plus part des transporteurs.
Il est à son premier prêt avec Soro Yiriwaso.
Avec ce prêt, monsieur Bakary compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 50 000 FCFA
Il envisage avec ce bénéfice agrandir sa boutique et construire un autre magasin.
texts.en:
Bakary is 28 years old, married, and the father of one child.  He lives with his wife and child in the Faraba neighborhood of Bougouni.  He did not attend modern [secular] school, but from a very young age he started to get involved in income-generating activities such as buying and selling tires and gluing tires and inner tubes.  In order to further strengthen his business, he decided to diversify his activities and to start buying and selling spare parts in addition to gluing and selling tires. 

He now has ten years of experience working in this field and he masters his activity well.

In order to increase the size of his shop, Bakary has decided to take a loan with Soro Yiriwaso.  This loan will help him buy 30 tires, 9 batteries, 3 key sets and 20 inner tubes, in Bamako.  He purchases his wares in Bamako, capital city of the Republic of Mali.

He sells in his shop and his customer base mostly consists of transport operators.

This is his first loan with Soro Yiriwaso.  With this loan, Bakary is expecting average monthly profits to reach 50,000 CFA francs.  With his profits, he is planning to increase the size of his current shop and build a second one.

loans.use: to buy spare parts.

loans.name: Hanan

texts.en:
Hanan, 49 years old, is a married woman. Her husband owns a grocery store that supports the family.

Hanan wanted to help and to have her own business that she loves doing, so she chose to make accessories from beads and gemstones. It has been six years now since she started and through those years, she participated in a few exhibitions and showrooms where she was introduced to a number of bead retailers. 

Now Hanan wants to expand her business,  add more types of accessories and participate in a special summer market that will help her spread the name of her business and allow her to open her own accessories store. 

Hanan has applied for this loan in order to buy more beads and new gemstones to design more accessories.

loans.use: to buy more beads and new gemstones to design more accessories

loans.name: Shokirjon

texts.ru: Шокирчон добрый и трудолюбивый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет пятерых детей. Более 9 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. Он начинал свой бизнес с выращивания лука. В бизнесе помогает жена. Шокирчон хотел бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений для обработки земли. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en:
Shokirjon is a good and hardworking man. He is married and raising five children.  He has been involved in agriculture for more than nine years, an activity he initially started by growing onions.  His wife helps him with the business.

Shokirjon would like to receive a loan for the purchase of mineral fertilizers to cultivate his land.  He is hoping for your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Majeda

texts.en:
Majeda, 41 years old, is married with four children. Her husband works in a dry cleaning shop. Majeda, on the other hand, has a small tailoring business at home to help her husband in supporting the family.

Majeda has applied for this loan to buy more fabric and embroidery thread to start making embroidered dresses in addition to the tailoring business.

loans.use: to buy more fabric and embroidery thread

loans.name: Sandy Catalina

texts.es:
Sandy es una joven emprendedora que decidió montar su propio negocio al dejar su empleo por ser muy mal remunerado. Sandy, con 22 años de edad, montó su negocio de alquiler de videojuegos, donde ofrece a sus clientes un gran servicio, lo cual ha permitido que tenga grandes clientes que le garantizan muy buenas ventas. Su negocio, a pesar de que fue montado con muy bajo capital, ha logrado crecer ha medida que pasan los meses y esto se ha visto reflejado en la gran cantidad de clientes que ha captado hasta la fecha. Debido a que su capacidad de atención a sus clientes se ha quedado un poco corta ante la gran demanda de sus clientes por el servicio, Sandy busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una consola de videojuego y un televisor para poder aumentar su capacidad y poder atender a todos sus clientes.

De esta manera, Sandy podrá atender todo el mercado y así sus ventas mensuales aumentarán considerablemente. Además, poco a poco irá cumpliendo su sueño de tener un gran negocio con el cual pueda asegurar un futuro económico y con el cual pueda ofrecer a sus padres una buena calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas.
texts.en:
Sandy is a young entrepreneur who decided to establish her own business after leaving a low-paying job. She is 22 years old and has a business of renting out video games. Sandy offers her customers a great service. Attracting good customers has guaranteed her the chance of generating good sales. Despite having little capital in the beginning, her business grew within months and the results are reflected in the large number of customers she has attracted to date. Her ability to gain so many customers over a short period of time is due to the great demand for this service. Sandy seeks this opportunity to obtain a loan so that she can purchase a video game console and a television. This will increase her capacity so that she can serve all of her customers.

As a result of this loan, Sandy will be able to serve her entire market and her monthly sales will increase considerably. In addition, she will gradually fulfill her dream of having a successful business to ensure her economic future. This will allow her to provide her parents with a good quality of life and more economic opportunities.

loans.use: to buy a video game console and a television.

loans.name: Ayat

texts.en:
Ayat is a conservative person and she is unwilling to upload her picture on the Internet, so the man in the photo is her husband.

Ayat is a 26-year-old married woman from Marka, Amman, Jordan, and a mother of three children.

Ayat sells clothes and she is requesting a loan of 800 JOD to purchase more quantities for trading purposes.

Ayat is looking to open a shop for her business.

Because Ayat is under 30 years old, her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for trading purposes.

loans.name: Tariq

texts.en:
Tariq is a 23-year-old single man from Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan.
Tariq has a perfume shop and is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to purchase more perfumes for trading purposes. He is looking to expand his business and improve his family's living conditions.
As Tariq is under 30 years old his loan is considered as a youth loan.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes for trading purposes.

loans.name: Maha

texts.en:
Maha is a conservative person so she is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet. The man in the photo is her husband.

Maha is a 19-year-old married woman from Idon, Irbid, Jordan and a mother of 2 children. She is looking to improve her family's living conditions, so she is requesting a loan of 700 JD to do maintenance on her house.

Because Maha is under 30 years old, her loan is considered as a youth loan.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her house

loans.name: Ahlam

texts.en:
Ahlam is a conservative person. She is unwilling to upload her picture on the Internet, so the man in the photo is her husband.

Ahlam is a 28-year-old married woman from Marka, Amman, Jordan, and a mother of two children.

Ahlam has a home-based beauty salon. She is requesting a loan of 700 JOD to purchase cosmetics for her salon.

Ahlam is looking to open a salon away from her house to increase her income and improve her family's life conditions.

Because Ahlam is under 30 years old, her loan considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Lina

texts.en:
Lina is a 23-year-old married woman who lives in Al Russeifeh, Jordan. She is a mother of one child.

Lina is looking to have a loan of 400 JDs, enabling her to buy and sell clothes so she can improve her living standards.

Lina is under 30 years old so her loan is considered as a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy and sell clothes

loans.name: Shamyah

texts.en:
Shamyah is 26 years old and single.  She lives in Al Khaledieh, Jordan.
 
Shamyah is a conservative woman so she is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her brother.

Shamyah is looking to have a loan of 400 JD so she can expand her sales in cosmetics.

Shamyah is under 30 years old so her loan is a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to do maintenance on her house

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is a conservative person so she is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet. The man in the photo is her brother.

Sarah is a 26-year-old married woman from Marka, Amman, Jordan and a mother of 2 children. She is looking to improve her family's living conditions, so she is requesting a loan of 700 JD to purchase new furniture for her house.

Because Sarah is under 30 years old, her loan is considered as a youth loan.

loans.use: to purchase new furniture for her house

loans.name: Dana

texts.en:
Dana is a conservative woman so she is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her mother.

Dana is a 21-year-old single woman. She lives in Al Hashmi, Jordan.

Dana is looking to have a loan of 500 JDs so she can expand her work in cosmetics and clothes sales. Dana is under 30 years of age so her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy and sell cosmetics and clothes

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a conservative women, so she is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her brother.

Amal is a 23-year-old married woman, a mother of 2 children, and she lives in Al Russeifeh, Jordan.

Amal is looking to have a 500 JD loan so she can improve  living conditions in her house. Amal is under 30 years old so her loan is considered a  youth loan.

loans.use: to improve conditions in her house

loans.name: Rihab

texts.en:
Rihab is a conservative woman, so she is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her husband.

Rihab is a 25-year-old married woman. She is a mother of one child. She lives in Al Nasser, Jordan.

Rihab is looking to have a loan of 400 JDs so she can expand her cosmetics business which can help her to increase her income. She is under 30 years old so her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics

loans.name: Raja'a

texts.en:
Raja'a is a conservative woman, so she is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her father.

Raja'a is a 25-year-old married woman and she is a mother of 2 children. She lives in Al Zarqa, Jordan.

Raja'a is looking to have a loan of 400 JDs, so she can buy and sell clothes. She is under 30 years old so her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy and sell clothes

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 26-year-old single man from Al Russeifeh, Jordan. He started his business three years ago. He was distributing mobile phone accessories to shops using his van, then with his hard work he was able to establish a shop for his business.

Now, Ahmad is requesting a loan of 1500 JD to to purchase new goods for his shop and renew its interior decoration. Ahmad is looking to increase his income and his family's living standard as well.

Because Ahmad is under 30 years old, his loan is considered as a youth loan.

loans.use: to purchase new goods for his store and renew its decoration.

loans.name: Rawan

texts.en:
Rawan is a conservative woman who is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her father.

Rawan is 22 years old and single. She lives in Irbid, Jordan.
 
Rawan is looking to have a loan of 400 JD so she can buy and sell clothes from her home.

Rawan is under 30 years old her so her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell

loans.name: Walaa

texts.en:
Walaa is a conservative person who is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet.  Thus, the man in the photo is her husband.

Walaa is a 21-year-old married woman from Irbid, Jordan. She has a home-based business in which she sells clothes. Walaa is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase more quantities of clothes for trading purposes.

Walaa aspires to continue her studies. 

Because Walaa is under 30 years old, her loan considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to sell

loans.name: Khetam

texts.en:
Khetam is a conservative woman who is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her brother.

Khetam is 29 years old and single. She lives in Al Khaledieh, Jordan.

Khetam is looking to have a loan of 500 JD to buy new furniture to improve her living conditions.

Khetam is under 30 years old, so her loan is consider a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy new furniture

loans.name: Gulshaiyr

texts.ru: Гулшайыр 42 года, замужем, воспитывает 4 детей. Гулшайыр работает в хлебопекарне и в качестве дополнительного  источника дохода для семьи, Гулшайыр занимается полеводством.  На сегодня в хозяйстве Гулшайыр имеется 0,67 га, где она выращивает хлопок.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса за счет животноводства, Гулшайыр обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы Гулшайыр планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Gulshaiyr is 42 years old, married and raising four children. Gulshaiyr works in the bakery and also does field crop cultivation as an additional source of income fo her family. Today she has 0,67 hectares of land where she cultivates cotton. With a goal to further develop her busienss Gulshaiyr has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy cattle. Gulshaiyr plans to invest the income from the loan to further increase her livestock.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Indira

texts.ru: Индира – участник группы «Учкун», замужем. Индира занимается животноводством и полеводством, имеет в хозяйстве 1 дойную корову, 1 теленка и 1 лошадь, а  также 2 га земли, где выращивает фасоль и многолетние травы. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Индира обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота.  Доходы от кредита Индира  планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Indira is a participant of the "Uchkun" group, married.  She is involved in animal husbandry and farming and has one dairy cow, one calf, one horse and also two hectares of land, where she grows beans and perennial herbs.  In order to further grow her business, Indira requested a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy livestock.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a continued expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Gulnura

texts.ru: Гульнура – участник группы «Бегимжан», замужем, воспитывает  4 детей, младшей из которых 1 год. Гульнура занимается животноводством и полеводством,  имеет в хозяйстве 10 овец, 6 ягнят и 3 дойные коровы. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гульнура обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 15,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дополнительных голов скота.  Доходы от кредита Гульнура планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья.
texts.en: Gulnura is a participant of the "Begimjan" group, married and raising four children, the youngest of whom is one years old.  Gulnura is involved in animal husbandry and farming and has ten sheep, six lambs and three dairy cows in her business.  In order to further develop her business, Gulnura requested a loan in the amount of 15,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy additional heads of livestock.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a continued increase of livestock headcount.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Fatou

texts.fr: Madame Fatou  vit au Sénégal. Elle est âgée  de 32 ans. Elle gère un salon de coiffure et  en meme  temps elle  évolue dans le commerce. Elle a une expérience de 4 ans dans ses activités. Son objectif est de subvenir  à ses besoins et assister  sa famille dans la gestion des charges du foyer. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEc depuis mai  2009. Elle a déjà remboursé  2 crédits antérieurs. Elle sollicite un prêt de 250 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de matériels  de coiffure. Son investissement a pour but de rendre plus accueillant son salon pour mieux attirer la clientèle. L’accroissement  de ses revenus lui permettra d’aider ses parents dans leurs besoins financiers et d’améliorer ses conditions de vie économique et sociale.
texts.en: Fatou lives in Senegal. She is 32 years old and manages a beauty salon, and also sells articles. She has four years’ experience. Her plan is to fund her needs and help her family to meet the household expenses. She has been a member of one of the UIMCEC branches since May 2009, and has already repaid her two previous loans. She has asked for a loan of 250,000 francs to buy hairdressing materials, and with her investment she plans to make her salon more welcoming to attract more customers. Her increased income will allow her to help her parents with their financial needs, and to improve her financial and social standing.

loans.use: to buy materials for her salon.

loans.name: Shingimizi Group

texts.fr:
A. Joselyne fait partie du groupe Shingimizi et habite à Gitega. Elle   a  30 ans et est mariée à  Jean Marie, un mécanicien. Ensemble ils ont  2 enfants, âgés de 9 mois à  3ans.

Elle  a un bistrot (vente de la bière de banane) depuis  10 ans. 

Elle est à son quatrième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et introduire la vente de la bière industrielle dans son commerce. 
Elle va acheter une grande  quantité de bière de banane et 3 casiers de bière Primus, à revendre, afin de gagner plus.
texts.en:
Joselyne is part of the Shingimizi group, and lives in Gitega. She is 30 years of age and is married to Jean Marie, a mechanic. Together they have two children, aged from nine months to three years of age.
She has an establishment where she has sold banana beer for the past ten years. 
This is Joselyne’s fourth loan with Turame. She plans to use the loan to increase her capital and start selling industrially produced beer in her business.
She plans to buy a large quantity of banana beer and three crates of Primus beer, which she will sell to make more money.

loans.use: to increase her stock of banana beer and buy three crates of Primus beer, which she will sell to make more money.

loans.name: Kanlé

texts.fr: Femme de 57ans, Kanlé  est revendeuse de produits de mercerie et divers dans une boutique. Elle a démarré cette activité en 1990 pour subvenir aux besoins de sa famille. Elle a  01  enfant de 18ans qui est scolarisé. Elle est à son quatrième crédit de WAGES et sollicite ce prêt pour acheter plus de marchandises afin de mieux répondre aux besoins des clients. Elle veut devenir grossiste et mieux s’occuper de l’éducation de son enfant vu qu'elle prend en charge elle seule.
texts.en: Kanlé is 57 years of age and sells dressmaking supplies and miscellaneous products in a store. She began this activity in 1990 to meet the needs of her family. She has one child, aged 18, who is at school. This is her fourth loan with WAGES, and she plans to use it to buy more goods so that she can better meet the needs of her customers. She wants to become a wholesaler and look after the education of her child, for whom she is the sole provider.

loans.use: to buy dressmaking supplies and miscellaneous products.

loans.name: Hamadoun

texts.fr:
Monsieur  Hamadoun  a 28 ans, marié, il réside avec sa famille à Kaboïla II, le centre ville de Sikasso ( troisième région administrative de la république du Mali).
Monsieur Hamadoun après avoir mené plusieurs activités sans succès,  s’est initié  depuis plus de dix ans aux activités de commerce d’articles divers dont il dispose d’une boutique à Kaboïla II où il mène cette activité d’achat et vente des articles divers (Cigarette, bonbon, allumette, Chewing Gum, lait en poudre, Thé, sucre, savon, etc). Il est beaucoup sollicité de sa clientèle pour la qualité de ses produits. 
Pour satisfaire sa clientèle de plus en plus croissante, il décide de rejoindre l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec qui il est un premier crédit qui lui permettra d’acheter, 10 cartouches de Cigarettes différentes, 4 sacs du sucre, 10 carton du thé, 5 paquets de bonbon, 10 paquets de Chewing Gum, 10 paquets d’allumette, 5 cartons de savons, etc. Ses marchandises sont achetées auprès de commerçants grossistes de la ville avant de les revendre en détail dans sa boutique à une clientèle mixte
  Il envisage réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel de 130 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour contribuer aux dépenses familiales, payer les intérêts de son prêt et investir le reste dans son activité.
texts.en:
Mr. Hamadoun is 28 years old, married, and lives with his family in Kaboïla II, the city center of Sikasso (in the third administrative region of the Republic of Mali).

After having run several businesses without success, Mr. Hamadoun learned the business of selling various goods more than 10 years ago, which he uses in a shop in Kaboïla II, where he runs this business buying and selling various goods (cigarettes, candy, matches, chewing gum, powdered milk, tea, sugar, soap, etc.). He is very much in demand among his customers for the quality of his wares.

In order to satisfy his ever-increasing customer base, he decided to join the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso, with whom he is on his first loan, which will allow him to purchase 10 cartons of various cigarettes, four sacks of sugar, 10 boxes of tea, five bags of candy, 10 packages of chewing gum, 10 packages of matches, five boxes of soap, etc. His merchandise is purchased from wholesalers in the city before being resold at retail in his shop to a group of customers of both genders.

Mr. Hamadoun expects to see a monthly profit of 130,000 CFA francs with this loan, which will be used to contribute to his family expenses and to pay the interest on his loan, with the rest being invested in his business.

loans.use: To purchase various goods for his shop.

loans.name: Mayerly

texts.es:
Mayerly es una joven emprendedora que decidió montar su propio negocio para generarse sus ingresos y contribuir económicamente en su hogar. Hace aproximadamente 2 años aprendió el arte de tejer bolsos en lana y otros materiales, y con esto decidió montar un negocio con el que pudo aportar en un principio a sus padres, y ahora que se encuentra casada aportar para el sostenimiento de su hogar, donde convive con su esposo y su hijo de 2 años. Los bolsos que fabrica Mayerly han tenido un gran reconocimiento gracias a la buena calidad que tienen, y gracias a esto ahora logra enviar sus productos a otras ciudades donde comercializan sus bolsos. Gracias a que sigue teniendo muy buen crecimiento, Mayerly requiere tecnificar su producción, por lo que busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de comprar una máquina para coser industrial y materias primas para la fabricación de sus productos.

De esta manera su negocio estará más tecnificado y así podrá producir en mayores cantidades para la comercialización en diferentes puntos, y haciendo esto logrará aumentar sus ingresos considerablemente, ofreciendo a su esposo y a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas.
texts.en:
Mayerly is a young businesswoman who decided to open her own business to generate income and contribute financially to her home. Approximately 2 years ago, she learned to weave bags out of wool and other materials. She them decided to open a business. At first she contributed to her parents with it, and now she is married and contributes to support her home where she lives with her husband and 2 year old son. The bags that Mayerly makes have been very well received thanks to their good quality. Because of this, she is able to send her products to other cities where they sell her bags. Thanks to continued good growth, Mayerly requires mechanized production. She is looking for a loan to afford her the opportunity to buy an industrial sewing machine and materials to make her products.   

This way, her business will be more mechanized and she will be able to produce in greater quantities to sell in different places. Doing this will increase her income considerably, and she will be able to offer her husband and son a better quality of life and better financial qualities.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine and materials to make her products.

loans.name: Abla

texts.fr: Revendeuse de produits cosmétiques et de mèches depuis 2006 dans une boutique, Abla est mariée à un déclarant en douanes et est mère de 04enfants : 02 sont scolarisés. Le premier a 10ans et dernier 01an. Elle est à son troisième crédit de WAGES et veut ce montant pour acheter des produits cosmétiques et des mèches. Elle vend seule et sa difficulté principale est la mévente.  Avec les profits, la cliente pense augmenter son fonds de commerce. Elle veut ouvrir d’autres boutiques similaires et contribuer au mieux au développement de ses enfants au coté de son mari. Elle est âgée de 28ans.
texts.en: Abla has been re-selling cosmetic products and hair extensions since 2006. She is married to a man who works in customs, and is a mother of 4 children, 2 of whom attend school. The oldest is 10 years old and the youngest is 1. She is asking for her third loan from WAGES in order to purchase cosmetic products and hair extensions. She works alone, and is worried about lower sales. She hopes to user her profits to increase her commercial space. She would also like to open other, similar boutiques and contribute to the development of her family. She is 28 years old.

loans.use: purchase extensions and cosmetic products

loans.name: Mawuena

texts.fr: Mawuéna est un homme de 28ans. Il est célibataire et n’a pas d’enfants. Il est vendeur de farines vitaminées depuis 2010 et le fait de façon ambulant. Il s’approvisionne dans les sociétés de fabrication de farines vitaminées et est à son premier cycle  à WAGES. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité et avoir une boutique pour mieux vendre aux clients.
texts.en:
Mawuéna is a 28-year-old man. He is single and has no children. He has been selling fortified flour on the street since 2010. He gets his supplies from companies that manufacture fortified flour.

This is Mawuéna's first loan cycle with WAGES. He wants to reinvest in his business and to one day own a shop, so that he is better able to sell to customers.

loans.use: to buy fortified flour.

loans.name: Gnamba

texts.fr: Gnamba est une femme de 31ans. Elle est mariée à un enseignant et a 02 enfants tous à l’école. L’ainé a 10ans et le dernier 07ans. Elle est revendeuse d’haricots  à la maison et est à son second crédit de WAGES. Elle veut ce prêt pour acheter des haricots. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité et devenir grossiste.
texts.en:
Gnamba is a 31-year-old woman. She is married to a teacher and has 2 children who both go to school. The eldest is 10 years old and the youngest 7.

Gnamba sells beans from her home and is on her second loan with WAGES. She wants to use this loan to buy beans. She wants to reinvest in her business and would like to become a wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy bags of beans.

loans.name: Ayélé

texts.fr:
Ayélé est une femme âgé(e) de 23 ans. Elle est célibataire.
Ayélé travaille comme revendeuse de boissons alcoolisées, de cartes de recharges  et autres  depuis 2011. Elle vend seule dans un kiosque et s’approvisionne à Lomé. 
Ayélé a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des produits de détails(boissons alcoolisées, cartes de recharges et autres). Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité et mieux se prendre en charge.
texts.en: Ayélé is a single, 23 year old woman. She has been selling alcoholic drinks and top-up cards for mobile phone credit since 2011. She sells on her own, in a kiosque, and stocks up on products in Lomé. She is asking for her first loan from WAGES in order to purchase larger quantities of merchandise. She would like to invest a greater amount in her business and take better care of herself.

loans.use: Purchase drinks and top-up cards for mobile phone credit

loans.name: Martha Lucía

texts.es:
Martha es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y siempre querer ofrecer a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida. Martha, gracias a estas cualidades ha logrado superar grandes adversidades en su vida y ha logrado seguir progresando junto con su familia. Martha es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de sus 2 hijos, pues su padre murió hace un tiempo y por tanto quedó a cargo de las obligaciones de su hogar. Gracias a que Martha ha trabajado desde muy temprana edad, pudo seguir sosteniendo los gastos de su hogar, lo que le ha permitido tener una buena calidad de vida a pesar de las dificultades. Martha tiene una experiencia de aproximadamente 30 años en el corte y cepillado del cabello, y gracias a esto su salón de belleza es muy reconocido y visitado por muchos clientes. Debido a que últimamente ha crecido a muy buen ritmo, ya se ha estado viendo con falta de insumos para su negocio, por lo que busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de comprar insumos para su salón de belleza como tratamientos, shampoo, gel, tinturas, entre otros.

De esta manera su negocio seguirá ofreciendo a sus clientes una buena atención y un buen servicio, y de esta manera sus ingresos seguirán garantizando a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida. Además, Martha espera que con unos ingresos superiores sus hijos tengan acceso a una educación universitaria que les permita prepararse y conseguir un empleo bien remunerado.
texts.en:
Martha is a person who has always been describes as hardworking. She always wants to offer her children a good quality of life. Thanks to these things, Martha has been able to overcome great adversity in her life and she has been able to keep progressing with her family. Martha is a single mother of two children. Their father dies some time ago and she took over the household obligations. Thanks to the fact that Martha has worked since she was very young, she was able to cover the household expenses, which has allowed her to have a good quality of life despite the difficulties. Martha has approximately 30 years cutting and styling hair. Thanks to this, her beauty Salon is very well known and frequented by many customers. Since she has grown at a good rate, she has been seeing a lack of materials for her business. That is why she is seeking a loan to afford her the opportunity to buy materials for her beauty salon, such as treatments, shampoo. gels, dyes and more. 

This way, her business will keep offering the customers good service and attention and her income will keep guaranteeing her children a good quality of life. In addition, Martha hopes that with higher income her children will have access to a university education that will allow them to find well paid jobs.

loans.use: to buy materials for her beauty salon such as treatments, shampoos, gels, dyes and more.

loans.name: Lassina

texts.fr:
Monsieur Lassina a 35 ans environ, marié et père de trois enfants, il réside avec sa famille à Wayerma II, le centre ville de Sikasso ( troisième région administrative de la république du Mali).
Monsieur Lassina après avoir mené plusieurs activités sans succès, s’est initié  depuis plus de trois ans aux activité de commerce général dont il dispose d’une boutique devant le domicile conjugal où il mène cette activité d’achat et vente des articles divers (Cigarette, bonbon, allumette, Chewing Gum, lait en poudre, Thé, sucre, savon, etc). Il est beaucoup sollicité de sa clientèle pour la qualité de ses produits. 
Pour satisfaire sa clientèle de plus en plus croissante, il décida de rejoindre l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso il y a environ quatre ans. Il a bénéficié de  4 crédits qui ont été tous correctement remboursés. 
Il sollicite ainsi ce cinquième crédit pour pouvoir acheter 15 cartouches de Cigarettes différentes, 10 sacs du sucre,15 carton du thé,  10 paquets de bonbon, 10 paquets de Chewing Gum, 25 paquets d’allumette et 20 cartons de savon. Ses marchandises sont achetées auprès de commerçants grossistes de la ville avant de les revendre en détail dans sa boutique située à Wayerma II.
Il envisage réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel de 175 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour contribuer aux dépenses familiales, payer les intérêts de son prêt et investir le reste dans son activité.
texts.en:
Lassina is about 35 years old, married, and the father of three children.  He lives with his family in Wayerma II, in the center of Sikasso (third administrative region of the Republic of Mali).

After being involved in several activities without much success, Lassina decided to learn about retail business more than three years ago.  He now has a shop in front of his house, and he buys and sells various goods such as cigarettes, candy, matches, chewing gum, powder milk, tea, sugar, soap etc.  The quality of his products makes him a very popular seller and the demand from his customers is high.

In order to satisfy the needs of an increasing number of customers, Lassina decided to join the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso about four years ago.  He has received four loans which have all been properly repaid.

Lassina is now requesting a fifth loan for the purchase of 15 cartons of various brands of cigarettes, 10 bags of sugar, 15 boxes of tea, 10 packs of candy, 10 packs of chewing gum, 25 boxes of matches and 20 boxes of soap.  He buys his goods from local wholesalers in town and retails them in his shop in Wayerma II.

With this loan, Lassina is expecting average monthly profits to reach 175,000 CFA francs which will be used to contribute to family expenses and pay off his loan's interest, while the rest will be reinvested in his business.

loans.use: to buy various grocery items.

loans.name: Djiguissèmè Group

texts.fr:
Composé de femmes mariées majoritairement dans des familles monogamiques, les dix  femmes du groupe Djiguissèmè ont  en moyenne 42 ans et 4 enfants. Elles habitent toutes le village de Zenguela dans la commune rurale de Sakoïba, région de Ségou (4ème région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de parenté et de mariage. Elles font le petit commerce d’agitateur local(un ustensile de cuisine en bois ou en métal, avec une extrémité en forme de flèche et qui permet de remuer les sauces en le faisant tourner en rond entre les mains. La première femme debout à droite a 2 agitateurs en bois en main. Elles vendent aussi de tamis, de condiments (gombo sec, tablettes de cube magie), des articles divers (sucre, cigarettes et boîte d’allumette). 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont  intègrent  Soro Yiriwaso  et sont à leur 1er cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame, Kadiatou (femme assise au milieu sur la photo) est une grande vendeuse de sucre dans le village de Zenguela. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 2 sacs de sucre dans le grand marché de  Ségou en gros. La revente se fait au comptant et à crédit à une clientèle mixte. Avec ce prêt, Madame  Kadiatou  espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 25 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et épargner.
texts.en:
Made up of women married and living for the most part in monogamous families, the 10 women of the Djiguissèmè group are on average 42 years old and have on average 4 children each. They all live in Zenguela village in the rural area of Sakoïba in the Ségou region (4th administrative region of Mali) and got to know one another through being neighbors, relatives and through marriage between their families. They sell locally-made whisks (a cooking utensil made of wood or metal, whose end is shaped like an arrow and which is used to stir sauces by rolling the tool between one's hands. The first woman standing on the right has two whisks in her hand.) as well as sieves, condiments (dried okra, packets if maggi boullion cubes), and grocery items (sugar, cigarettes and matches).

In order to increase their working capital, the members of this group joined Soro Yiriwaso and are on their first solidarity group loan cycle.

Madame Kadiatou (the woman seated in the middle in the photo) is a well-established sugar seller in Zenguela village. She plans to use her loan to buy 2 sacks of sugar wholesale in the large market in Ségou. She resells on a cash basis and also awards credit to her diverse clientele. With this loan, Madame Kadidiatou hopes to make a monthly profit of on average 25,000 CFA Francs, which will be reinvested in her business and savings.

loans.use: to buy sugar.

loans.name: Feigbene

texts.fr: Agée de 32ans et mère de 01 enfant de 04ans qui va à l’école, Feigbené est mariée à un commerçant. Pour aider son mari dans les charges du ménage, elle a commencé par vendre depuis 2003 des céréales dans un marché de la place. Elle est à son second crédit de WAGES et sollicite ce montant pour acheter des sacs de céréales. Elle veut avec les profits supplémentaires réinvestir une partie dans l’activité et prendre le reste pour acheter des produits vivriers pour la famille. Elle veut renforcer l’activité et assurer l’éducation des enfants pour qu’ils deviennent des adultes équilibrés.
texts.en:
Feigbené is 32 years old, married to a shopkeeper, and the mother of one child, who is 4 years old and goes to school. She has been selling cereals at her local market since 2003, so that she is able to support her husband with the household expenses.

This is Feigbené's second loan with WAGES and she has requested it so that she can buy bags of cereals. She would like to reinvest part of her supplementary profits in her business, and to spend part of them on buying food for her family. She would like to strengthen her business and provide her children with an education so that they grow into balanced adults.

loans.use: to buy bags of cereals.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Toutes mariées dans des familles polygames les 4 femmes du groupe Benkadi ont  en moyenne 34 ans et 5 enfants. Elles habitent toutes  dans le quartier Dougounina de la ville de Bougouni et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de parenté et de leurs activités professionnelles. 
Elles font l’achat et la vente des oignons à l’image de la présidente du groupe Fanta, des condiments alimentaires, des jus de fruits et des céréales.
 Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont intégré Soro Yiriwaso  et sont à leur 9 eme prêt solidaire. Les huit précédents ont été correctement remboursés
Madame, Fanta (3eme  femme gauche vers la droite sur la photo) est la vendeuse d’oignons de toutes qualités et qui est très appréciée et sollicitée à Bougouni. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 20 sacs d’échalotes auprès des grossistes venant de Sikasso. Elle effectue ses ventes au comptant, en détail et à crédit à une clientèle composée essentiellement de femmes. 
Avec ce prêt, Madame  Fanta espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 95.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et aider son mari à prendre en charge certains besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
All married in polygamous families, the four women in the Benkadi group are 34 years old on average and have an average of 5 children each. They all live in the Dougounina neighbourhood of Bougouni and are neighbours, relatives and business associates. 

They buy and sell various products such as onions, like the group leader Fanta, condiments, fruit juice and cereals.

The members of the group joined Soro Yiriwaso in order to increase their business funds. This is their ninth solidarity loan. The eight previous loans have all been repaid correctly.

Fanta (pictured 3rd from the left) sells onions of all qualities and is much sought-after in Bougouni. She will use her loan to buy 20 bags of shallots from Sikasso wholesalers. Her customers include both men and women, and they pay cash or buy on credit. 

With this loan, Fanta hopes to make 95 000 CFA francs on average, part of which will be reinvested in the business and part of which will help her husband to meet household expenses.

loans.use: to buy onions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine to increase her production capacity and be able to respond to the orders from her customers.

loans.name: Issaka

texts.fr: Femme de 64ans, Issaka est mère de 02 enfants(30 et 25ans) dont 01 à l’école. Elle est veuve et vend des céréales  depuis 1990 pour pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de la famille. Elle vend à la maison et s’approvisionne à Lomé. Elle sollicite ce second crédit de WAGES pour acheter des sacs de céréales. Elle veut acheter des céréales supplémentaires, et assurer la prospérité  de son commerce. Elle veut subvenir aux besoins scolaires de son enfant.
texts.en:
Issaka is a 64-year-old woman and the mother of 2 children, aged 25 and 30, one of whom attends school. She is widowed and has been selling cereals since 1990, so that she is able to meet her family's needs. She sells her produce from home and gets her supplies in Lomé.

Issaka is requesting this second loan from WAGES so that she can buy bags of cereals. She would like to buy additional cereal and ensure the prosperity of her business. She wants to be able to meet her child's educational needs.

loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Nidal

texts.en:
Nidal is a twenty-nine-year-old young married man, the father of one daughter. His wife is employed in a local institution and gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's needs and costs.

Nidal is requesting a 3,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of completing work on his house. He wants to do work such as installing tiles, painting, installing windows and doors. This will improve the house's condition and enable Nidal and his family to live in the house soon and enjoy suitable living conditions.

Nidal is photographed the picture.

loans.use: To complete work on his house.

loans.name: Ayed

texts.en:
Ayed is a twenty-four-year-old young single man. He is a factory employee with a low salary, which is not enough to cover all his costs and needs.

Ayed is requesting a USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of improving the condition of his house. He wants to do work such as painting and installing new doors instead of the old ones. This will improve the conditions in which Ayed lives. 

Ayed is photographed inside his house.

loans.use: To improve the condition of his house.

loans.name: Elham

texts.en:
Elham is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Mohammad appears in her Kiva profile photo, pictured while he is selling sweets in his store.

Elham is a 22-year-old young woman. She is married with no children yet. For the past year, Elham's husband has been opening a store for making and selling different types of sweets, which has been a profitable project but also hasn't been making enough to cover all the costs.

Elham is requesting a 3,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help her husband cover the costs of purchasing new supplies for making sweets. Taking this loan will enable Elham's husband to improve the quality of his work and increase the quantity of sweets he makes for customers. This will lead to increased sales and improve the family's income.

loans.use: To purchase new supplies for making sweets

loans.name: Mohannad

texts.en:
Mohannad is a 27-year-old single young man. For the past 10 years he has been operating a workshop for repairing and painting vehicles, which has been a profitable project but not earning enough to cover all the costs.

Mohannad is requesting a 2,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing new supplies for repairing vehicles and collections of paints that are necessary to complete his work. Taking this loan will offer Mohannad the new repairing supplies that will improve the quality of his work, therefore increasing the number of customers that need to repair and fix their vehicles and improving Mohannad's income.
Mohannad is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: To purchase new supplies for repairing vehicles and collections of paints

loans.name: Mansoor

texts.en:
Mansoor is a 21-year-old single man. In the last four years, Mansoor has opened a butcher shop and has been raising a herd of calves. It has been a profitable project, but not quite enough to cover all his costs.
Mansoor is requesting a 2000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing fodder in bulk to feed his herd of calves. This will lead to fattening calves and increase sales, improving Mansoor's income.
Mansoor is photographed inside his Butcher shop.

loans.use: to purchase fodder in bulk to feed his herd of calves

loans.name: Shireen

texts.en:
Shireen is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Allam appears in her Kiva profile photo, taking a picture next to his stall.

Shireen is a 30 year old young woman, she is married to Allam and is a mother with one son. In order to increase the family's income, she is employed and her husband has a stall for selling different collections of products from one year ago.

Shireen is requesting a 3,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help her husband cover the costs of purchasing a new collection of products for sale such as: clothes, hair and hand creams, toys..etc,  and expanding and improving the stall's condition. This will attract customers and increase sales and improve the family's income to better.

loans.use: To improve her husband clothing stall's condition and purchase a new collection of products for sale.

loans.name: Lennis Jhoana

texts.es:
Lennis es una joven emprendedora que desde muy temprana edad decidió generar sus propios ingresos para sostener sus gastos de estudio y contribuir económicamente en su hogar. Lennis tiene 19 años de edad y desde hace aproximadamente 4 años montó un negocio de venta de prendas de vestir donde sus principales clientes son compañeros de estudio, familiares, amigos y vecinos. Gracias a esto, Lennis ha tenido la oportunidad de pagarse sus estudios y de contribuir en su hogar para que sus padres y hermanos tengan una mejor calidad de vida. Gracias a la buena atención que ofrece y a la buena calidad de sus productos, ha logrado captar una gran cantidad de clientes para su negocio, lo que le garantiza muy buenas ventas mensuales; y es por esto que Lennis busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de comprar prendas de vestir para responder a los pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes.

De esta manera, Lennis tendrá la oportunidad de responder a los grandes pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes y no verse afectada por la falta de capital en su negocio. Además, así podrá ir creciendo cada vez más y seguir cumpliendo su sueño de pagarse sus estudios universitarios.
texts.en: Lennis is a young hardworking woman who decided to start at an early age to generate her own income in order to pay for her studies and contribute to household expenses. She is 19 years old and started her own business 4 years ago: she sells clothes, mainly to classmates, family members, friends and neighbours. Thanks to this, Lennis has been paying for her studies and contributing to household expenses, so as to give her parents and siblings a better quality of life. Thanks to the good customer service she provides and to the quality of her products, she has many customers, and thus makes a nice profit every month. This is why Lennis asks for a loan that would enable her to buy more clothes so as to fulfil her customers' orders. This way, Lennis will be able to fulfil large orders for her customers and will not have to suffer from her lack of capital. Furthermore, her business will be able to grow and keep helping her to afford going to university.

loans.use: to buy clothes so as to fulfil her customers' orders.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 60 years old, married, and has children.  She is from the village of Alibagu. Teresita buys and sells used bottles and steel in her junk shop. She earns approximately 8,000 PHP a month. 

Teresita s requesting a loan for 10,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase additional products to sell.  She joined ASKI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities.

loans.use: to buy products for her junk shop.

loans.name: Kura Group

texts.fr:
Désiré fait partie du groupe Kura et habite à Gitega. Il  a  33 ans et est marié à Fabiola, une cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont 4 enfants, âgés de 1à  7 ans, dont un seul étudie à l’école primaire.

Il fait le commerce de boutique (riz, haricot, sel,…) depuis  10 ans. 

Il est à son huitième  crédit àTurame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter beaucoup d’articles de sa boutique afin de gagner plus. 

Dans les prochains jours, il voudrait  continuer  à agrandir sa boutique.
texts.en:
Désiré is a member of the Kura group and lives in Gitega. He is 33 years old and married to Fabiola, a farmer. The couple have 4 children, aged between 1 and 7 years old, one of whom attends primary school.

Désiré has been running a shop selling various food products (e.g. rice, beans, salt, etc.) for 10 years. This is his 8th loan with Turame. The Kiva-sponsored loan will increase his capital and he will use it to buy many products for his shop so that he can earn more. In the coming days, he would like to continue expanding his shop.

loans.use: to restock on merchandise for his shop.

loans.name: Majeda

texts.en:
Majeda is a 46-year-old married lady. Her husband has recently retired from his job.

Majeda has a small grocery store where she has been working for two years now. She has applied for this loan to buy a refrigerator for the store to start selling drinks.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator for the store.

loans.name: Tahani

texts.en:
Tahani, a 33-year-old single lady, has been living with her sister since both of her parents passed away.

To be able to support herself, Tahani started a small retail business selling home products at home. 

Now that she decided to work on expanding the business, Tahani has applied to this loan to bring in more collections of home products and work on expanding the market using word of mouth among friends and neighbors.

loans.use: to buy more home products to sell.

loans.name: Abdallah

texts.en:
Abdallah, a 43-year-old married man, has two sons and a daughter. They live in Al Mafraq.

Abdallah has a fruits and vegetables store in the middle of the market. He has been working there for three years now.

Abdallah has applied for this loan to expand the business and open another store in another market.

loans.use: to open another fruits and vegetables store.

loans.name: Sawsan

texts.en:
Sawsan,is a 50-year-old married woman. She has six sons and daughters. They live in a rented house.
 
Sawsan has been selling blankets for the last five years to help her husband in supporting the family. 

Now Sawsan has applied for this loan to start selling clothes as well, so she wants to buy new collection of clothes.

loans.use: to start selling clothes.

loans.name: Abdulhadi

texts.en:
Abdulhadi is a 50-year-old married man. He has three sons and one daughter.

Abdulhadi has owned an upholstery business for 15 years. Through those years he worked very hard to improve his services and build the business he now has.

Abdulhadi has applied for this loan to bring in more colorful fabric to add variety to his products.

loans.use: to bring in more colorful fabric for his upholstery business.

loans.name: Rania

texts.en:
Rania is a 37-year-old conservative woman. Her husband, Sameer, works in a printing house. She asked him to take her place in the photo.

Rania and Sameer have five sons and one daughter. After his retirement, he started working in the printing house to be able to support the family. Rania also started to do a home products retail business at home. They recently started to use his experience to design wedding invitations to print at the print house.
 
Now Rania has applied for this loan to buy more home products and help her husband in the wedding invitation printing to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more home products to sell.

loans.name: Larry

texts.en:
Larry is 49 years of age, married to Rolygen, and has been blessed with three children. His eldest child has finished his degree course, while the other two left are still studying. The couple work hard in order to support the education of their two children and sustain their daily needs.

Larry owns one and half hectares of cornfield. He has managed it for almost 20 years. He is really thankful because his sacrifices have been fruitful, most especially to his eldest child.

He would like to improve his agricultural business in order to support his two children in their studies. With regard to his goal, he would like to ask for financial assistance amounting to PHP 21,000, which will be used to buy fertilizer for the care of his corn crops.

According to him, providing necessary treatment for corn crops will ensure that the yields will increase. So Larry believes that he can make all things possible through his capacity to trust himself and the Lord. He hopes to obtain the loan amount requested.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for the agricultural business.

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.en:
Esperanza has been a widow since 2010. Despite her situation as a single parent to her four children, still she is able to raise them well. All her four children have settled into marriage and have their own family.

Esperanza's main source of income comes from a farming business. She currently runs her one hectare of cornfield and one hectare of banana farm land. She has been doing this farming business since 1960. She is glad because she is able to manage her farmland properties.

She would like to take out a loan amounting to PHP 17,000 to purchase fertilizer for the corn. She hopes that through this loan, she can increase her profit to cover all her household expenses and save some for emergencies when she gets older.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for the corn business.

loans.name: Yusuf

texts.ru: Юсуф около 20 лет занимается выращиванием сельхозпродукции. Он трудолюбивый и хороший семьянин. На воспитании имеет четверых детей. В основном Юсуф выращивает лук, а также занимается выращиванием и продажей скота. Имеет около 70 голов мелкого рогатого скота, основную часть составляет козлята, кроме того продает их шерсть. Юсуф  запрашивает для покупки минеральных удобрений для обработки земли.
texts.en: Yusuf has been farming produce for about 20 years. He is a hard-working person and a good family man. He is raising four children. Yusuf mainly grows onions, and also raises and resells livestock. He has a livestock of about 70  goats and sheep, mainly goats. He also sells their wool. Yusuf is requesting [a loan] in order to buy mineral fertilizers for his land.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Fanny Elena

texts.es:
Fanny se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos de 11 y 6 años de edad, a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer una buena calidad de vida. Es por esto que al ver que los ingresos de su esposo no eran suficientes para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar y brindarles una buena calidad de vida, decidió montar su propio negocio desde su casa y aprovechando un espacio ocioso que tenía montó una tienda general donde ofrece productos de la canasta familiar. El negocio lo inició hace aproximadamente 1 año, y gracias a la buena atención que ofrece en este ha logrado captar un gran número de clientes para su negocio; sin embargo, debido a que su negocio fue montado con muy bajo capital, ha visto que pierde algunas ventas por la poca variedad de productos que ofrece en su tienda, es por esto que busca que un préstamo le permita comprar productos de la canasta familiar y así aumentar su surtido para ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes.

De esta manera su negocio podrá seguir creciendo y garantizando unos ingresos con los cuales Fanny contribuya económicamente para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Además, Fanny espera que su negocio le permita acceder a la compra de su casa propia y a brindarles a sus 2 hijos una mejor educación y una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Fanny is married and has two children, ages 11 and 6, whom she always has wanted to give a good quality of life.  This is why, upon seeing that her husband's income was not enough to support the household expenses and give them a good quality of life, she decided to set up her own business in her house.  Making the most of an idle space she had, she set up a general store where she sells staple products.

She started the business approximately a year ago and, thanks to her good service, she has managed to attract a large number of customers for her business.  Nevertheless, because her business was set up with very low capital, she has seen that she loses some sales because of the small variety of products she sells in her store.  This is why she is looking for a loan to allow her to buy staple products to increase her stock and offer her customers a bigger variety of products.

In this way her business will be able to continue to grow and guarantee some income with which Fanny can contribute economically to the support of her home.  In addition, Fanny hopes that her business will allow her to buy her own house and give her two children a better education and better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy staples to increase her stock and have a greater variety of products for her customers.

loans.name: Emilio Antonio

texts.es:
Emilio es una persona muy trabajadora que siempre ha querido brindarles a sus 3 hijos una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para su progreso. Padre soltero a cargo de sus 3 hijos, debido a que su esposa murió y el quedó viudo y con las responsabilidades del hogar, Emilio se ha esforzado en su trabajo diariamente para poder garantizar el sustento necesario para su hogar. Hace aproximadamente 5 años Emilio montó su propia fabricación de escobas, traperos y demás implementos de aseo, pues luego de trabajar durante largos años como empleado decidió independizarse debido a la baja remuneración que tenía su trabajo. Gracias a este negocio ha tenido la oportunidad de generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar y brindarles a sus hijos una mejor educación. Gracias a que últimamente sus pedidos se han aumentado considerablemente, Emilio busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de materias primas para la fabricación de escobas y traperos. 

De esta manera su negocio seguirá creciendo y podrá seguir garantizando los ingresos suficientes para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar y seguir brindando a sus hijos una buena educación y una buena estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Emilio is a very hardworking man who has always tried to offer his 3 children better living conditions and chances to get ahead financially. He is a single father who has cared for his 3 children since his wife died, leaving him a widower responsible for the household.  Emilio strives daily to provide for their needs.

About 5 years ago, Emilio started his own business making brooms, mops, and other cleaning tools. After many years of working as an employee for low wages, he decided to start working for himself. This business has given him the chance to earn the necessary income to cover his household expenses and give his children a good education. 

Emilio is requesting a loan because lately his orders have increased greatly. The loan would allow him to buy supplies to make brooms and mops. In this way, his business can grow and produce sufficient income to cover his household expenses, and Emilio can continue to provide his children with a good education and financial stability.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make brooms and mops.

loans.name: Irimbere Group

texts.fr:
Claver  fait partie du groupe Irimbere et habite à Gitega. Il  a   30 ans et est marié à  Joséphine, vendeuse d’habits. Ensemble ils ont 3 enfants, âgés de 1 à 6 ans, dont 1seul étudie à l’école maternelle.

Il fait le commerce d’habits depuis 3 ans. 

Il est à son sixième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et  acheter beaucoup d’habits à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait acheter une parcelle et la bâtir, grâce aux bénéfices de son commerce.
texts.en:
Claver is a member of the Irimbere group and lives in Gitega. He is 30 years old and married to Josephine, a clothing vendor. They have three children together,  between one and six years of age, only one of whom is in kindergarten.

He has been selling clothing for three years. He is on his sixth credit with Turame. With this Kiva loan, he is going to bolster his capital and buy a lot of clothing to resale, so as to increase his revenues.

In the years to come, he would like to buy a building plot, thanks to his business revenues.

loans.use: to bolster his capital and buy a lot of clothing to resale, so as to increase his revenues.

loans.name: Lilian Ansonia

texts.es: Doña Lilian es Casada tiene 51 años de edad vive con su esposo  lleban 32 años de casados tiene 3 hijos que ya son casados, ella empeso vendiendo costuras uniformes de toda clase. actualmente tiene una zapateria ella los elavora cuenta con una persona que le ayuda a elavorar calzado y aparte de eso tiene tres tiendas en diferentes lugares,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materiales para elavorar calzado,su sueño es tener un talles mas grande para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Doña Lilian is 51 years old and lives with her husband of 32 years. After her 3 children married, she started selling all types of uniforms. Today she has a cobbler's shop, where she employs another person to help her make shoes, and three others stores in different locations.

She is requesting a loan to buy materials to make shoes. Her dream is to have a larger shop so that she can generate more income.

loans.use: to buy materials to make shoes.

loans.name: Maria Leticia

texts.es: Maria Leticia,tiene 39 años de edad y tiene 2 hijos, ella inicio su negocio cuando era muy joven empeso vendiendo productos por catalogo, luego estudio en confeccion de costuras, y ya por ultimo puso una tienda de productos comestibles de primera nececidad ella vende, arroz,frijol, aceite,etc esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos comestibles,el sueño de ella es terminar sus estudios ya que esta sacando el nivel basico por madurez. espera que le puedan dar ese apoyo que ella nececita para su negocio.
texts.en: Maria Leticia, age 38, has two children. She started her business when she was very young. First, she sold products through a catalogue. Later, she studied sewing. Finally, she opened a food store where she sells basic staples such as rice, beans, and oil. She is requesting a loan for the purchase of food products. Maria Leticia's dream is to finish her studies; she getting a basic education in a school for adults. She hopes that you can give her the support she needs for her business.

loans.use: to buy food products for sale.

loans.name: Nou

texts.en:
Nou is 52 years old and has seven children, four of whom live with her in Kampong Chhnang province.  Her other three children are married. To earn a living, she grows rice. To help Nou earn additional income, two of her daughters work as garment laborers in a factory in the province, earning a monthly salary. 

Nou is requesting a loan from HKL, which she will use to purchase land for housing purposes. She will use the remainder of the loan to pay for her children’s school fees. Nou hopes to improve her living conditions. For her business goal, Nou wants to buy extra farmland to increase her annual rice production.

loans.use: to purchase land for housing purposes.

loans.name: Salvacion

texts.en:
Salvacion is married to a retired seaman and has four children, three of whom are married and one whom attends school.  She raises hogs in the village of Dumabato Sur Maddela. 

Salvacion is requesting a loan for 12,000 PHP, which she will use to buy livestock feeds and vaccines for her hogs.  She would like to increase her income to support her youngest child's education. She believes that this small capital will eventually help her in obtaining success in life. In addition, she is hoping for continuous access to financial services from ASKI so that she could send her youngest child to a higher level of education.

loans.use: to buy livestock feeds and vaccines for hogs.

loans.name: Ricardo Andres

texts.es:
Ricardo es un joven que decidió montar su propio negocio con el ánimo de generar sus propios ingresos, y así sostener sus gastos y al mismo tiempo contribuir económicamente en su hogar. Desde hace aproximadamente 3 años montó un parqueadero de motos y carros, en el cual trabaja en largas jornadas y gracias al buen servicio que ofrece ya puede generar un empleo. Con este negocio Ricardo ha logrado tener muy buenos ingresos que le han permitido a el y a su familia tener una mejor calidad de vida. Gracias al crecimiento que ha tenido su negocio, Ricardo busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de realizar algunas adecuaciones locativas a su parqueadero de modo que pueda tener una mayor capacidad para aparcar más vehículos. 

De esta manera sus ingresos aumentarán considerablemente, pues podrá atender a más clientes en su negocio. Además, con mayores ingresos su familia podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y Ricardo podrá acceder a una mejor estabilidad económica y un futuro económico mejor.
texts.en:
Ricardo is a young man who decided to start his own business with the intention of generating his own income.  This is the way to cover his expenses while at the same time contributing financially to his household.

Approximately three years ago he started a parking business for motorcycles and cars.  He works long hours at his business.  Thanks to the good service that he offers he can now generate employment.  With this business Ricardo has managed to get very good income.  This income has allowed him and his family to have a better quality of life. 

Thanks to the growth that he has had in his business, Ricardo is looking for a loan to make some renovations to his parking lot.  That way he will be able to have a greater capacity to park more vehicles.  This way his income will increase considerably.  He will be able to tend to more customers in his business.

Also, with greater income his family will be able to have a better quality of life.  Ricardo will be able to have better financial stability and an improved economic future.

loans.use: to make some renovations to his parking lot in order to have a greater capacity to park more vehicles.

loans.name: Mirna

texts.es:
Mirna, de 47 años de edad, es una mujer empeñosa y trabajadora, además de ser amable y cordial.  Està casada con Edison quien es padre de sus 3 hijos Edison de 27, Dandy de 25, Johan de 21 años de edad.  Vive en compañía de su esposo e hijos a los que quiere mucho, habitando su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Mirna, es la venta de ropas de segundo uso,  para lo cual realiza viajes periódicos cada mes a la capital  donde realiza sus compras buscando los mejores precios comprando en fardos grandes sin abrir, para luego venderlos entre sus vecinos, amistades y personas  recomendadas de manera personal, además  también vende los vende en los caseríos de la rivera de los ríos realizando viajes cortos a esa zonas buscando nuevos clientes.
Realiza éste negocio  hace más de 5 años, y hasta el momento los realiza ella sola.
Considera su negocio bastante rentable pues en loas zonas alejadas los vende sobrecosto obteniendo buenas ganancias. Le gusta su negocio pues le genera ingresos económicos para solventar los gastos de su hogar y gracias a ella ha logrado educar a sus hijos de los cuales se siente orgullosa de haberlos sacado adelante, además de haber  logrando tener muchas satisfacciones gracias a su negocio. 
Por tanto tiene los deseos de ampliar su negocio y hacerlo crecer. Este será el préstamo número 13 con la institución MFP. Por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Además de sentirse a gusto con banco comunal pues considera a  su grupo ser unido y solidario.
Con el monto solicitado de 1200 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de ropas de segundo uso buscando los precios más bajos y así tener mayores ganancias, ya que cuenta con pedidos por entregar.
texts.en:
Mirna, age 47, is an earnest and hardworking woman. She is also friendly and cordial. Mirna is married to Edison, who is the father of their three children: Edison (age 27), Dandy (age 25), and Johan (age 21). She lives in her own home with her husband and children, who she loves dearly. Mirna sells secondhand clothing that she acquires by making periodic trips to the capital each month. There she is able to find the best prices by purchasing large unopened bundles. She sells the clothes to neighbors, friends, and people who have been recommended to her. Mirna also sells in the villages along the river and makes short-term trips in search of new customers. She has been in business for more than five years and has worked alone to this day.

Mirna considers her business to be profitable because she is able to generate good earnings in the remote villages where she sells. She enjoys working because she is able to earn income to cover her household expenses. Thanks to what she has achieved, Mirna has been able to provide an education for her children. She is proud that she has moved forward and gets a great amount of satisfaction from her business. However, she faces challenges in expanding her business and making it grow.

This will be her 13th loan with the MFP organization. She hopes to receive assistance so that she can follow through with her plans. Mirna feels comfortable working with her Communal Bank because she considers her group to be unified and supportive. The amount of 1,200 PEN that she requested will be invested in secondhand clothing. She will look for the lowest prices so that she can maximize her profits. Mirna has orders that she must fulfill.

loans.use: to buy secondhand clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a fast food cart and supplies to prepare her food.

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is 58 years old, married, and has three adult children. They live harmoniously in a village, planting rice and raising livestock for sale. Despite her financial difficulties, she is determined to improve their poor living conditions.

She and her husband help each other in managing their rice-farming business, to ensure high production. To generate additional income, Rosita engages in a hog-raising business. She planned to raise more pigs for sale, but because she has inadequate capital, she is asking for additional capital of PHP 35,000 to buy feed, vitamins and additional piglets to raise, and the materials needed to improve the pig pen. She believes that she can improve her business as she continues to work hard and strive harder.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and additional piglets to raise and materials needed to improve the pig pen

loans.name: Phon

texts.en:
From the Prey Chor district of Kompong Cham province, Phon, 33 and a mother of two school-aged children, has spent most of her life cultivating rice. She has been doing this business for more than 20 years. She usually works with her husband in the rice field. For additional income, Phon has operated a business by going through her community to sell Khmer noodles from her old bicycle. 

She would like to request a loan to pay for her husband's medical fees. She hopes that her husband can recover from his illness soon. She is very thankful for the support from our lenders. In the future, Phon wants to continually support her children’s education until they finish at least high school level.

loans.use: to pay for her husband's medical fees.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.en:
Reynaldo is a father who is very determined to improve his family's living status to give them a better life. He is 43 years old and has four school-aged children. They live happily in a village, planting and harvesting rice and vegetables for sale. 

Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, he engages in a hog-raising business to earn additional income to support his children's education. He is asking for additional capital of PHP 50,000 to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines needed for hog-raising. He mentioned that his loan will enable him to improve his business and hopes that he will be successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines needed for hog-raising

loans.name: Rozel

texts.en:
Rozel is a responsible housewife who engages in a hog-raising business to help her husband finance the education of their two children. They plan to improve their sources of livelihood so they can continue to send their children to school, as they want them to earn a degree and become professionals in the future.

Due to financial burden, Rozen aims to improve her hog-raising business to increase her income. She is requesting additional capital of PHP 29,000 to buy feed, vitamins and additional piglets to raise. She believes that through patience and hard work, she will improve her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and additional piglets to raise.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is a 60-year-old married woman with four grown-up children. At her age, she is still strong enough to fulfill the needs of her family. Gloria manages a store in front of their house. She is requesting a loan of PHP 12,000 to buy additional products such as canned goods, snack foods, and drinks for her store.

In the future, she hopes that her business will expand to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snack foods and drinks for her store.

loans.name: Tiberio Antonio

texts.es:
Tiberio es una persona muy trabajadora que ha tenido que superar grandes adversidades en su vida. Tiberio tiene 1 hijo de 15 años a quien su madre abandonó hace un tiempo, por lo que todas las responsabilidades han quedado sobre Tiberio y por tanto debe garantizar siempre el sustento necesario para su hijo. Tiberio tiene su negocio de venta de frutas desde hace aproximadamente 15 años, el cual ha logrado acreditar ante sus clientes gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos. Gracias a este negocio, tiene la posibilidad de generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, por lo que siempre se ha esforzado por que este crezca y cada vez sus ventas aumenten considerablemente. Debido a la escasez de frutas que hay en su región, Tiberio debe traer estas frutas de otras regiones, por lo que busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de frutas las cuales debe conseguir en otras regiones debido a la escasez de frutas en su región.

Tiberio de esta manera podrá seguir teniendo su negocio y podrá seguir saliendo adelante junto con su hijo. Además, así podrá seguir generando los ingresos necesarios para su hogar y poco a poco irá cumpliendo el sueño de tener su casa propia y un local para su negocio.
texts.en:
Tiberio is a hardworking individual who has had to overcome great adversities in his life. He has a 15-year-old son whose mother abandoned them some time ago, so he is fully responsible for always making sure that his son has everything he needs. Tiberio has managed a fruit business for approximately 15 years. He has been able to gain customers thanks to the good quality of his products. Through this business, he has been able to generate the necessary income to maintain his household expenses. For this reason, he always strives to grow and his sales increase considerably each time. There is currently a shortage of fruits in the region, so he must have fruit shipped in from other areas. Tiberio is seeking this opportunity to access a loan so that he can buy fruit from other regions because of the local shortage.

Tiberio would like to continue his business so that he and his son can keep moving forward. He also would like to continue generating needed household income and gradually fulfill his dream of owning a home and a shop for his business.

loans.use: to buy fruits.

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en: A very strong and determined person from the village of Alibagu, Estrella is married and has three grown children. She has managed a community-based store for three years. Estrella is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy spices, noodles, coffee, milk, and bread for her store. In the future, Estrella hopes that her business expands. She wants to build a store in front of her house so that she can provide for the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy spices, noodles, coffee, milk and bread for her store

loans.name: Nubia

texts.es:
Nubia ha tenido que superar grandes adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida, y gracias a sus ganas de trabajar a podido salir adelante y seguir progresando junto a su familia. Madre soltera cabeza de familia de sus 8 hijos, pues su padre los abandonó hace un tiempo sin hacer alguna contribución económica para su sostenimiento, Nubia se vio en la obligación de generar grandes ingresos para poder sostener su hogar.
