In the future, she would like to run an additional business of fish farming to generate more income to support the family. Moreover, she hopes to build a fence and help her children get bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to use for tilling her farmland.

loans.name: Sok Ny

texts.en:
Sok Ny, 45, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been running a tailoring shop for more than 10 years, earning approximately USD 4 per day. Her husband is employed in China. He earns about USD 10 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family's transportation, Sok Ny is requesting a loan of USD 500 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the money saved on her transportation expenses to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor's degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more convenient for her family's living condition.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Sokha

texts.en:
Sokha, age 55, resides with her husband and three children in the Kampong Chhnang Province of Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband and two of her children are employed at the provincial health department. They earn about $13 per day. 

Due to transportation difficulties, Sokha is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase a motorbike so her family can commute to work. This purchase would enable her to use the money she spends on transportation expenses to support the family.

In the future, Sokha would like to build a fence around her house and help her youngest child earn a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute to work.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en:
To overcome poverty, Catalina is engaged in a hog-raising business to generate additional income. She is now 52 years old and has two grown-up children. Catalina and her husband live happily in a village, planting and harvesting rice and vegetables to sell. They have been farmers for more than 30 years, earning profits of PHP20,000 in every harvest season. They utilize their income for their daily consumption and allowances for their children in school.

Due to financial difficulties, Catalina aims to improve her hog-raising business to increase her income. She wants to ask for an additional capital of PHP18,000 to buy feeds, vitamins and vaccines needed in hog-raising. Despite problems and difficulties she encounters in life, she has the strong determination to pursue the business. She hopes that, someday, her business will grow and become a viable source of income.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins and vaccines needed in hog-raising.

location.town: Brgy. Balzain, Dupax del Sur, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Nay Ki

texts.en: Nay Ki, 27, is married, and resides with her husband and one child in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for over ten years, earning approximately USD 3 per day. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about USD 5 per day. Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Nay Ki is requesting a loan of USD 500 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to run a barber shop and help her children get bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute.

loans.name: Sarun

texts.en: Sarun, 64, is widowed and resides with two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling vegetables for more than four years, earning approximately USD 7 per day. Her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about USD 6 per day. In order to provide hygienic living condition for her family, Sarun is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase construction materials to build a new kitchen. In the future, she would like to run a tailoring shop for her children and rebuild her house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to build a kitchen.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is from the village of Tallang. She lives with her husband and youngest child. She has three children, two of whom live with their own families. She provided a good education to them through sacrifices and hard work.

The family has a farming business, and Cristina also sells meat and fish at the market. She has been doing this for more than 12 years. She is now asking for a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy more beef, pork, fish and shrimp to sell.

Cristina will be very happy when she achieves economic stability. She also would like to save money to use for when emergencies arise.

loans.use: to buy more beef, pork, fish and shrimp to sell.

loans.name: Sirley Veronica

texts.es:
Sirley es una joven emprendedora que ha visto como sus dificultades económicas las puede superar con un gran esfuerzo. Tiene una hija de 1 año de edad y debido a que su esposo no genera los ingresos suficientes para el sostenimiento de todos los gastos de su hogar, decidió montar su propio negocio con el cual pudiera contribuir económicamente para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Fue así como montó una venta de obleas y de helado a las afueras de su casa la cual ha venido trabajando desde hace aproximadamente 1 año y con la cual genera ingresos extras para su hogar. El negocio ha tenido que superar grandes dificultades ya que hace poco tiempo su hija se enfermó y Sirley no pudo abrirlo durante unos días, con lo cual sus ingresos disminuyeron notablemente y hasta ahora se ha venido recuperando de esta adversidad. Gracias a que se esfuerza mucho en este negocio, ha logrado captar una gran cantidad de clientes para este, y es por eso que ahora Sirley busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de comprar insumos para la preparación de sus obleas y la venta de helados, y seguir ofreciendo buenos productos a sus clientes.

De esta manera podrá seguir progresando con su familia y seguir ofreciendo a su hija una buena calidad de vida. Además, Sirley sueña que su negocio pueda trasladarlo a un lugar mejor, ya que lo atiende a las afueras de su casa.
texts.en: Sirley is an entrepreneurial young woman who has seen how she can overcome her economic difficulties by working hard.  She has a 1-year-old daughter and, owing to the fact that her husband doesn't earn enough income to cover all their household expenses, she decided to set up her own business so that she could contribute financially towards the household expenses.  She started selling wafers and ice cream outside her home and has been in this business for approximately one year.  The business makes her additional income for her household.  Sirley's business has experienced difficulties because her daughter became sick a short time ago and she was unable to open up for some days.  This meant that her income was noticeably reduced and she has been recovering from the setback since that time.  Thanks to the fact that she works hard in her business, Sirley has managed to attract a large number of customers.  She is currently looking for a loan that will allow her to buy supplies.  This will allow her to make her wafers, sell her ice cream, and continue offering her customers good products.  In this way, she will be able to continue making progress together with her family and continue offering her daughter a good quality of life.  In addition, Sirley dreams of moving her business to a better location as she currently works outside her home.

loans.use: to buy supplies which will allow her to prepare her wafers, sell her ice cream, and continue offering good products to her customers

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy is 29 years old, married, and has two school-age children. She and her husband planned to educate their children and give them a better life. Despite the hardship of living, they are striving hard to satisfy their necessities and support the education of their children. To earn additional income, Daisy engages in hog-raising business while she does the household chores. 

She planned to raise more pigs to sell but due to insufficient capital she was not able to pursue her plan. Therefore, she is requesting an additional capital of PHP 18,000 to buy feed, vitamins, and additional piglets to raise. She believes that through this loan she will be able to work out her plan and hopes that she will be successful in carrying it out.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and additional piglets to raise

location.town: Brgy. Balzain, Dupax del Sur, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Cecilia Margarita

texts.es:
Cecilia es una mujer de 38 años de edad, con 3 hijos a su cargo. Vive en casa propia, la cual esta ubicada en Caserìo Tejedores Bajo del Distrito de Tambogrande, lo cual cuenta con el servicio básico de energìa eléctrica.
La actividad que desarrolla Cecilia  es la venta de productos de belleza, ropa y accesorios femeninos. Cecilia se dedica a este negocio desde hace más de 2 años. Recorre caseríos aledaños en busca de clientes, y además que es conocida en la zona.
El monto solicitado dl prèstamo es de S/. 2000 nuevos soles y necesita  para comprar  más  mercadería de  productos de belleza, ropa, (polos, short, sandalias, bividi), accesorios (adornos)  para surtir su negocio. Cabe resaltar que su negocio se encuentra en crecimiento, posee pedidos, lo que le permite seguir manteniéndose en el mercado.
texts.en:
Cecilia is 38 years old and she has 3 children economically depending on her. She lives in her own house in the hamlet Tejedores, in the Tambogrande district, and the house is equipped with electricity.
Cecilia sells beauty products, clothes and accessories for women. She has been engaged in this activity for more than 2 years. She visits neighboring hamlets looking for customers, and she is well known in the area.
She is requesting a loan of 2000 PEN she needs to buy more products such as beauty products, clothes (polo shirts, shorts, sandals, undershirts) and accessories (ornaments) to stock up her inventory. It must be stressed that her activity is growing: she has received some orders, thus being able to keep her activity in the market.

loans.use: To buy  beauty products, clothes and accessories.

loans.name: Marìa Irma

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 45 años de edad, tiene 02 hijos de los cuales el mayor ya es dependiente.  Su domicilio se encuentra ubicada en el caserìo Josè Carlos Mariategui del distrito de Motupe, cuenta además con los servicios básicos de agua y luz.
La actividad que desarrolla  María  es la venta de ropa  , esta actividad la realiza desde hace  10  años en el mercado de Motupe , aprendió esta actividad de su padre. Cuentan con clientes  ya establecidos en la zona. 
El monto solicitado del crédito es de 3,000 nuevos soles lo cual será para surtir su negocio y de esta manera poder aumentar su capital de trabajo, y poder tener mejores ingresos para su hogar .así mismo cuenta con clientela ya establecida
texts.en:
María is a 45 year old woman.  She has two children the older of which is already independent.  Her address is located in José C. Mariategui, Motupe District.  It has both electricity and water.

The activity that María carries out is clothing sales.  She‘s been doing this for the last ten years at the market in Motupe.  She learned this activity from her father.  She has an established clientele in the zone.

The amount requested is 3000 new soles that she’ll use to stock her business so that she can increase working capital and earn better income for her home; she has a well-established regular clientele.

loans.use: to stock her business with merchandise.

loans.name: Benedo

texts.es:
Benedo es un hombre de 52 años de edad, soltero y sin hijos, Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en el caserío San Martín , Distrito de Tambogrande del departamento de Piura. Así mismo Benedo vive con su madre quien lo apoya en sus actividades que realiza.
La actividad que desarrolla  Benedo es la agricultura y  ganadería (ovinos y porcinos) lo cual tiene experiencia en este rubro, además cuenta con terreno que su madre le ha dado como herencia donde tiene  instalado limón que se  encuentra en producción y que viene cosechando semanalmente.
El monto solicitado del  crédito es de S/.1,000 nuevos soles lo cual será para la compra de alimentos para sus animales y compra de fertilizantes para su cultivo de limón, esto le va  permitir seguir creciendo en su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Benedo is 52 years old, he is single and has no children. He lives in his own house in the hamlet of San Martín, in the Tambogrande district. Benedo lives with his mother who supports him in his job.
Benedo is a farmer and a livestock breeder (sheep and pigs). He has some experience in this field, and he also owns some land that his mother bequeathed him where has planted lemon trees that are currently bearing fruit and that he weekly harvests.
He is requesting a loan of 1,000 PEN that he will use to buy animal feed for his animals and fertilizers for his lemon trees. This will allow his to keep on growing with his activity and to improve his standard of living.

loans.use: To buy animal feed and fertilizers.

loans.name: Asunciona

texts.es:
Asunciona es una mujer de 50 años de edad, conviviente, con 03 hijos dependientes, vive en casa propia en el Caserío Huaca de Barro, ubicado a 25 minutos de la ciudad de Mórrope.
La actividad que realiza  Asunciona es la crianza y venta de animales, los cuales los cría en corrales ubicados en la parte exterior de su domicilio,  alimentándoles a  sus animales con pastos naturales, polvillo, maíz, etc. así mismo se dedica a  cría de ovejos, chivos, chanchos, aves de corral, etc.
Su Cónyuge de Asunciona se dedica trabajar en su parcela lo cual tiene instalado cultivo de algodonero lo que lo apoya con la canasta familiar y tener ingresos adicionales.
El monto solicitado del Crédito es de 1,200 nuevos soles, lo que  será destinado para invertirlo en la  compra de alimentos para sus animales y en la  compra de fertilizantes para su cultivo de algodón. y de está manera poder aumentar su capital de trabajo poder tener mejores ingresos para su hogar, así mismo cuenta con clientes ya establecidos.
texts.en:
Asunciona is a woman who is 50 years of age, in a common-law relationship, and has three dependent children.  She lives in her own home in the village of Huaca de Barro, which is located 25 minutes away from the city of of Mórrope.  Asunciona's business involves raising and selling animals, which are kept in an area outside of her home.  The animals are fed natural grasses, powdered feed, corn, and other items.  She raises sheep, goats, pigs, poultry, and other livestock.  Her husband works on a parcel of land where he grows cotton to help feed the family and earn additional income.  

The loan amount of 1,200 PEN that she requested will be invested in the purchase of feed for her animals and fertilizers for her cotton crop.  This will increase her operating capital so that she can improve her household income.  Asunciona already has established customers.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and fertilizers for her cotton crop.

loans.name: Marìa Rosa

texts.es:
María es una mujer de  33 años de  edad estado civil conviviente, cuenta con 2 hijos menores  de edad, vive con sus hijos y su  cónyuge, su domicilio esta ubicado en el caserío Cruz del Médano del distrito de Mòrrope y la calidad de vida en la comunidad es de subsistencia, la mayoría son trabajadores independientes la cual se dedican al  comercio y crianza de animales, adicionalmente dedicados a la agricultura y ha trabajar como dependientes en labores agrícolas. 
La actividad comercial a la que se dedica Marìa es la crianza de  animales y venta de productos veterinarios, lo que posee experiencia en este rubro por más  de 5 años en dicha actividad, el negocios  lo posee en su propio domicilio,cuenta con clientes ya establecidos.
.El monto solicitado  del préstamo es de 1,000 nuevos soles, lo solicita para invertirlo en su negocio y tiene pensado ampliar un poco más su  negocio de veterinaria y comprar alimento para engorde de animales menores y ganado porcino. Actualmente  se ha propuesto ampliar su inventario en lo referente a productos  veterinarios debido a que es una actividad muy rentable en la zona.
texts.en:
María is a 33-year-old woman who is in a common-law relationship and has two young children.  She lives in her own home with her husband and children in the village of Cruz del Médano, which is in the District of Mòrrope.  The quality of life in this community is at a subsistence level.  Most of the residents are independent workers who engage in trade and animal breeding.  They also engage in agriculture and work as hired farm laborers.  

Maria has a business that involves raising animals and selling veterinary products.  She has experience in this type of work and has been in business for more than five years.  Her businesses are managed from her home and she has established customers.  The loan amount of 1,000 PEN that she is requesting will be invested in her business.  She has plans to expand her veterinary business a little bit more and to buy feed for fattening her small animals and her pigs.  At the moment, she proposes to expand her inventory of veterinary products since this a very profitable business in her area.

loans.use: to buy balanced animal feed and veterinary products.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos es un hombre de 33 años de edad, conviviente y con 03 hijos como carga familiar, Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en  el  Caserío Peña Viva del Distrito de Tambogrande. Cliente vive en la parte rural  de este distrito. Y solo cuenta con servicio básico de energía eléctrica.
La actividad que desarrolla Santos es la agricultura y la ganadería, contando con animales menores como son ovinos, cerdos y aves de corral, además cuenta con 2,0 has de terreno agrícola sembrado de limón que cosecha semanalmente y vende  diariamente.
El  monto solicitado del crédito es de 2200 nuevos soles y  será para  la compra de fertilizantes para el cultivo de limón y además para realizar limpieza del mismo, así como la compra de alimentos para sus animales, lo cual le permitirá venderlos a un mejor precio en el mercado.
texts.en:
Santos, 33, is married and has 3 children. He owns his home in the village of Peña Viva in the district of Tambogrande. He lives in a rural part of the district and the only utility he has is electricity. 

Santos farms and raises small animals like sheep, pigs and chickens. He has 2 hectares of farmland planted with lemons that he harvests weekly and sells daily. 

The 2200 nuevos soles requested will be used to buy fertilizers for his lemon crop and to weed it, as well as to buy feed for his animals so that he can sell them at a better price in the market.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and maintain his vegetable garden.

loans.name: Jeny Lorena

texts.es:
Jeny es una mujer de 34 años de edad de estado civil conviviente, cuenta con 2 hijos a su cargo y vive con su esposo en casa propia, su domicilio esta ubicado  en el distrito de la matanza, cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona, cliente responsable.
Jeny se dedica a la venta de verduras, frutas y condimentos, desde hace 3 años y lo realiza en su domicilió, en el distrito de la matanza. Su esposo es agricultor jornalero.
El monto solicitado del préstamo es de 1,508 nuevos soles  lo solicita para invertirlo en su negocio, específicamente para la compra de verduras, compra de balay para la exhibición de su negocio, para que de esa manera  brinde una mejor atención a sus clientes.
Así mismo esto remitirá a que tenga mejores ingresos y por ende una mejor condición de vida en la zona,  ya que el mercado es bueno para invertir en este tipo de negocio, cabe indicar que en el distrito no hay mercado y cada comerciante oferta sus productos en sus domicilios, teniendo así mejores utilidades, pues no pagan sisa.
texts.en:
Jeny is a 34-year-old woman who is in a common-law relationship.  She has two children under her care and lives with her husband in their own home, which is located in the District of La Matanza.  Jeny has good personal and work-related references in the area and is known for being a responsible client.  She has been selling vegetables, fruits, and condiments for the past three years out of her home in the District of La Matanza.  Her husband is a farm laborer.  

The loan amount of 1,508 PEN that she is requesting will be invested in her business, specifically the purchase vegetables and wicker baskets for displaying goods in her business.  This will enable her to provide better service to her customers.  By generating a better income, she will have better living conditions in the area.  The market is good for investing in this type of business.  It should be noted that there is no marketplace in this district, so individual merchants offer their products from their homes.  They are able to generate more profit since they do not pay a tax.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and wicker baskets for displaying produce.

loans.name: Duo Cerro Alto Group

texts.es:
DUO CERRO ALTO
María Rosa, que tiene 34 años de edad y es  madre soltera y tiene 1 hijo, nos cuenta que como actividad principal vende huevos desde hace 3 años y ahora tiene una pequeña tienda en su casa y nos cuenta que solicita este crédito para poder ampliar su tienda ya que en el sector en donde ella vive no hay tiendas cercas y la gente necesita caminar mucho para llegar a la tienda más cercana entonces ella quiere tener productos para que las personas se queden con ella comprando, es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos comestibles de primera nececidad.
texts.en:
CERRO ALTO DUO

María Rosa, 34, is a single mother; she has one son.  She tells us that as her main activity she’s sold eggs for three years and now she has a small store at home.  She tells us that she’s asked for this loan to be able to expand the store because in the sector where she lives there are no stores nearby and people have to walk a long way to reach the nearest store so she wants to have products so that people will stay to buy from her and this is why she’s asking for the loan to buy basic staple foodstuffs.

loans.use: to buy basic staple items to stock her store.

loans.name: Solidario Bendicion De Vista Hermosa Group

texts.es:
Solidario Bendicion de Vista Hermosa.
Doña Enma de 31 años de edad ella tiene una tortilleria desde hace varios años nos cuenta que esta muy contenta porque hasta ahora a podido cumplir sus metas, gracias a la ayuda que kiva la a dado atravez de los prestamos,es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de maiz y leña ya que nececita mas capital para trabajar ya que sus clientes han aumentado espera que kiva le pueda seguir ayudando para que siga adelante en sus negocio.
texts.en:
Bendición de Vista Hermosa Solidarity Group

Emma, 31, has had a tortilla shop for several years and she tells us that she’s very happy because she’s been able to reach her goals to date thanks to the support Kiva has given her through the loans.  This is why she’s asking for this loan to buy corn and firewood since she needs more capital to work because her customers have increased.  She hopes that Kiva will be able to continue to support her so that she can get ahead with her business.

loans.use: to buy firewood and corn.

loans.name: Lily

texts.es:
Lily es una mujer  separada de su conviviente con dos hijos a su cargo, conocida en el medio, por su labor en la venta de productos y útiles escolares en su localidad, vive junto a su padre, quien  es jubilado y la ayuda con sus gastos familiares y en el soporte económico familiar; además es una  persona con buenas referencias. Vive en el distrito de Cayalti Provincia de Chiclayo del Departamento de Lambayeque; y esta muy dedicada al comercio.
Lily se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y productos de belleza, desde hace más de 15 años, con el préstamo implementara con más productos a su negocio y así poder dar mayor calidad de vida a su familia.
El monto solicitado del crédito es de S/. 1000 nuevos soles y será para invertirlo en la compra de productos de belleza y así poder surtirlo su negocio, ya que cuenta con clientes ya establecidos.
texts.en:
Lily is a woman who is separated from her partner and has two children to care for.  She is well-known for her work selling cosmetic products and school supplies in her area.  She lives with her father who is retired and helps her with her family expenses.  Besides this, she has good personal references.  She lives in the Cayalti district and is very dedicated to business, agriculture and raising animals.

Lily has worked selling cosmetics and beauty products for more than 15 years.  With this loan, she will include more products in her business and thus be able to give a better quality of life to her family.

The amount requested is 1,000 nuevos soles and it will be used to invest in the purchase of beauty products to stock her business, since she already has established customers.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of cosmetic products for her business.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
Alicia es una mujer de 37 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, con 2 hijos, vive con sus hijos, en el distrito de Cayalti, provincia de Chiclayo del departamento de Lambayeque , además es una persona con buenas referencias en su sector.
 Alicia se  dedica a la venta de abarrotes, desde hace más de 3 años, en su propio domicilio, lo cual vende productos de primera necesidad como: arroz, azúcar, leche, condimentos, gaseosas, etc.
El monto solicitado del crédito es de S/.2,000 nuevos soles y será para invertirlo en la compra de mercadería para su bodega de esta manera poder atender los pedidos de sus clientes y obtener más ingresos y por ende  mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Alicia, age 37, is single and has two children.  She lives with her children in the Cayalti district.  She is also a person who has good references in her area.

Alicia has been selling groceries in her house for over three years.  She sells basic needs items like rice, sugar, milk, condiments, and soft drinks, etc.

The requested 2,000 soles are to buy merchandise for her store.  That way she will be able to take care of her customers’ orders and get more income.  She will do this in order to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Zokirjon

texts.ru: Зокирчон женат воспитывает сына. У него на иждивении находятся мать и брат с семьей. Семья большая. Он занимается торговлей женских тканей. В бизнесе помогает сестра. Более 8 лет он занимается этим бизнесом и имеет богатый опыт. Для расширения своего товара он хочет получить займ и надеется на поддержку.
texts.en: Zokirjon is married and raising a son.  He is also supporting his mother and brother with his family.  The family is large.  Zokirjon is involved in selling women's fabrics.  His sister helps him with the business.  He has been in this business for over eight years and has a rich experience.  Zokirjon wants to obtain this loan to expand his merchandise selection and relies on your support.

loans.use: to buy fabrics

loans.name: Claudia Andrea

texts.es:
Claudia es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por tener un gran carisma, y es por esto que desde muy joven ha tenido claro la actividad con la cual quería trabajar en su vida. Claudia estudió atención a la primera infancia y posteriormente montó una guardería con el aval de las entidades del gobierno en la cual educa a niños y a los cuales les brinda el cuidado que no les pueden brindar los padres ya que trabajan durante todo el día. Es así como ha visto el surgimiento de su negocio a la par de que puede desempeñar la actividad que siempre ha querido. Gracias a sus conocimientos, las visitas de los entes del gobierno que le dan la garantía para trabajar han salido muy bien calificadas, y gracias a esto ha tenido la oportunidad de hacerse conocer por diferentes personas. Su guardería la tiene ubicada en una casa que se encuentra adecuada para el cuidado de los niños y debido a que esta casa ya tiene muchos años, Claudia busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a realizar arreglos al techo de la casa donde tiene su guardería para poder ofrecer mayor calidad en su servicio y brindar tranquilidad en su oficio.

De esta manera podrá tener un hogar para el cuidado de los niños con mayor seguridad y brindará mayor tranquilidad a los padres de estos niños. Además, así podrá ser más atractiva la guardería para los clientes y podrá seguir teniéndola como fuente de ingresos para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar.
texts.en:
Claudia has always been charismatic and because of it, she knew exactly what she wanted to do in life. Claudia studied to be a kindergarten teacher and with support from government entities, started a kindergarten to educate children and provide care that parents aren’t able to during the day when they’re at work. This is how her business came to be and how she was able to develop the activity she had always wanted.  
Thanks to her knowledge, reviews from the government entities that guarantee her work have come back very positive, and thanks to this she has had the opportunity to introduce herself to different people.
Her kindergarten is located in a house that is adecuate for taking care of children, but is old. Claudia is requesting a loan to repair the roof of her house in order to offer a better quality service and have peace of mind on the job.  
This way, she will have a safer home to care for the children and provide the parents with peace of mind. 

Also, this is a way to make her kindergarten more attractive to clients and she’ll be able to continue having this source of income for the maintenance of her household expenses.

loans.use: repair the roof of her house in order to offer a better quality service and have peace of mind on the job.

loans.name: Norma Elizabeth

texts.es:
Norma tiene 30 años. Viven en Guayaquil. Es madre soltera y vive con sus 2 hijos. 
Empezó a vender productos por catálogos por iniciativa de una prima. Trabaja sola ofreciendo sus productos a sus amistades y vecinos en las Orquideas. No tiene horario fijo. Nos cuenta que la época más difícil de su negocio es el invierno ya que disminuye sus visitas por la lluvia. Su mayor temor son las enfermedades sobre todo en esta época porque no tiene ayuda de familiares. El préstamo lo utilizaría para comprar perfumes, maquillaje y ropa. Su sueño es comprar una casa propia.
texts.en: Norma, 30, lives in Guayaquil; she’s a single mother and is living with her two children.  She started out selling products via catalogues thanks to a cousin’s initiative.  She works alone offering her products to her friends and neighbors in Las Orquídeas.  She does not have a fixed work schedule.  She tells us that the most difficult season for her work is winter because her visits decline due to the rain.  Her greatest fear is illness especially in this time because she has no help from family members.  She will use the loan to buy perfume, make-up and clothes.  Her dream is to buy a house of her own.

loans.use: to buy perfume, creams and cosmetics.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Due to hardship of living, Marites chose to be single to support the education of her younger brothers and sisters. She is engaged in the hog-raising business to generate income. She is engaged in the hog-raising business as well as farming to generate additional income. She has been operating this business for almost eight years. Despite problems and difficulties she encountered in life, she has the determination to improve the business. 

She is requesting for a loan of PHP 18,000 to buy feed, vitamins, and vaccines needed for her hog-raising business. She believes that she can be able to make an improvement in her business as she continue to work hard and strive for it.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and vaccines needed for hog-raising

location.town: Brgy. Balzain, Dupax del Sur, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is 50 years old, married, and has four children who attend school.  She is a devoted mother who expresses her full devotion not only to her business but to her family as well.  

Julieta sells clothes and accessories in the market, which she has been doing for six years. She earns 20,000 PHP a month.

Julieta is requesting a loan for 50,000 PHP, which she will use to increase her merchandise so that her income will increase and she she will be able to save for her children's education. Nothing is more important to her than having a stable source of income for the welfare of her family.

loans.use: to buy pants, dresses, and children's clothing and accessories to sell.

loans.name: Roy Justiniano

texts.en:
Roy Justiniano is cooking and selling food for daily meals and snacks. He has been doing this for over 10 years and earns about PHP5,000 each month. He is now 49 years old and has one grown up child. 

Roy would like to improve his services and ensure more delectable meals to sell so he is now asking for a loan of PHP10,000 to buy ingredients and meat used in cooking food to sell. He would like to earn more funds to use in expanding the business to achieve a better way of life someday.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and meat used in cooking food to sell.

loans.name: Kaminoi

texts.ru: Каминой успешный предприниматель более 8 лет  занимается торговлей женских тканей. Она замужем на воспитании имеет  четверых детей. Семья большая и на ее содержание уходит много средств. Она старается привозить товар разных ассортиментов. Для получения большей прибыли она хочет получить займ и пополнить ассортимент своего товара. Она надеется на вашу поддержку и помощь.
texts.en: Kaminoi has been a successful entrepreneur for over eight years.  She is involved in selling women's fabrics.  She is married and raising four children.  The family is large, and lot of resources go toward supporting it.  Kaminoi tries to bring in various selections of merchandise.  She wants to obtain this loan to refill her merchandise selection in order to make a large profit.  She relies on your support and help.

loans.use: to expand merchandise selection

loans.name: Nary

texts.en:
Nary is 61 years old, widowed and has two children who are employed as a chef and a security guard. She lives in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker who receives support from her children. They earn about $8 per day. 

Nary is requesting a loan for $300, which she will use to purchase construction materials to build a kitchen. This money will help her get a hygienic kitchen for her family. In the future, she would like to run a tailoring shop to earn more income to support her family.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to build a kitchen.

loans.name: Bahriniso

texts.ru: Бахринисо это молодой предприниматель, которая только начала предпринимательскую деятельность. Опыта пока нет, но начало деятельности показало, что она трудолюбивая и целеустремленная женщина. Она замужем и имеет двоих детей. Муж плотник и они вместе стараются создать все благоприятные условия в своем доме. Она продает продукты питания. У нее свои клиенты и она старается хорошо обслужить их. Товар у нее всегда свежий. Она хочет получить займ для расширения бизнеса
texts.en: Bahriniso is a young entrepreneur, who just started her entrepreneurship.  She does not yet have experience, but the start of her business showed that she is a hardworking and goal-oriented woman.  Bahriniso is married and has two children.  Her husband is a carpenter, and together they try to create all the favorable conditions at home.  She sells food products.  Bahriniso has her own clients and tries to serve them well.  She always has fresh merchandise.  She wants to obtain this to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy food products in order to expand her business

loans.name: Ana Yoladis

texts.es:
Ana es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo sus ganas de trabajar y salir adelante le han permitido superar las dificultades y continuar progresando al lado de su hijo. Ana es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de su hijo de 9 años de edad, pues su padre los abandonó hace un tiempo y desde entonces toda la responsabilidad recae sobre ella. Durante gran parte de su vida ha trabajado, pues proviene de una familia de escasos recursos económicos por lo que se vio en la obligación de contribuir económicamente desde muy joven, y fue así como empezó a trabajar en una tienda general de una persona conocida y poco a poco fue adquiriendo una gran experiencia. Posteriormente con unos ahorros logró montar su propia tienda general donde ofrece productos de la canasta familiar, la cual ha logrado sacar adelante pese a la dificultad de no contar con mucho capital. De su tienda ha logrado generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar y poder brindarle a su hijo una buena educación, y gracias a que su negocio ha venido creciendo en gran ritmo, Ana busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de comprar productos de la canasta familiar para surtir su tienda y seguir ofreciendo una buena variedad de productos a sus clientes.

De esta manera su negocio podrá seguir creciendo y cada vez más ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida en su hogar, además de que poco a poco podrá ir cumpliendo su sueño de sacar adelante su hijo con una buena educación.
texts.en:
Ana is a person who has had to overcome many adversities in her life. In spite of these, her desire to work and get ahead has allowed her to triumph over the difficulties and continue progressing alongside her son. Ana is a single mother who heads a family with a 9-year-old son whose father abandoned them some time ago and since then, all responsibility has fallen on her. 

During a great part of her life, Ana has worked. She comes from a family with scarce economic resources and has felt obliged to contribute economically since she was very young. Thus, Ana began working in the general store of a friend and, little by little, she acquired much experience. 

Later, with some savings, Ana managed to start her own general store where she offers the products in the family basket, and has managed to forge ahead despite the difficulty of having very little capital. Her store has generated the necessary income to sustain her home and to be able to offer her son a good education, owing to the fact that the store has been growing at a good rate. 

Ana hopes that a loan will offer the possibility of purchasing more products from the family basket to stock her store and continue offering a good variety of merchandise to her customers. In this way, her store can continue growing and over time, offer a better quality of life for her home. In addition, little by little, she will be able to continue fulfilling the dream of advancing her son with a good education.

loans.use: buy products for the family basket to stock her store and continue offering a good variety of products to her customers.

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.en:
Rosalia is 59 and has two adult children. Her husband manages their rice farming business while Rosalia engages in a hog-raising business to supplement her husband income. Despite problems and calamities they encounter in life, they have the determination to improve their status of living to give their children a better life. 

Rosalia plans to improve her pig pen and raise more pigs to sell, but due to inadequate capital, she is requesting for an additional PHP18,000 to buy feeds, vitamins, additional piglets to raise and also to purchase materials needed to improve the pig pen. She is hoping that the loan will help a lot to improve the business and hopes that she will become successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, additional piglets to raise and materials needed to improve the pig pen.

location.town: Brgy. Balzain, Dupax del Sur, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en:
Angelina shares that being a widow, it is a big responsibility for to provide for all her children's needs. Instead of losing her hopes, Angelina works hard just to feed her four children. Now, Angelina is in her sixties and her children are already adult age. 

Angelina runs a store business in their village. She sells shampoo, soap, toothpaste and curls. Angelina has been in this business for 15 years. She is able to provide for her children's needs through profit she earns from the business. Angelina wishes to maintain the business and develop for a continued source of income. She is asking for financial support in being able to maintain the business. Angelina is requesting a loan of PHP30,000 to buy soft drinks, breads, coffee, milk and sugar to sell in their village. She hopes to maintain the business and to earn a higher income.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, breads, coffee, milk and sugar to sell in their village.

loans.name: Pedro Abel

texts.es:
El señor Pedro Abel es soltero, tiene 22 años de edad, logro graduarse pero actualmente no ha conseguido empleo, se dedica a la tejeduría de cortes típicos, cuenta con el apoyo de su familia, inició este trabajo como operario y hasta el momento lleva 8 años de experiencia.

solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilos de diferente clase y colores y poder mejorar su producción, espera en el futuro tener un capital amplio.
texts.en: Pedro Abel, 22, is single.  He succeeded in graduating but hasn’t been able to secure employment to date.  He works weaving traditional fabric and has his family’s support.  He started out in this type of work as an employee and to date has 8 years’ experience.  He’s asking for the loan to buy various threads of various types and different colors to be able to improve production.  He hopes to have ample capital in the future.

loans.use: to buy thread.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: Elena  de 57 años vive (duran  Guayaquil). Ella decidió entrar a este negocio porque es una buena manera de tener dinero para poder darles lo necesario a sus hijos. Este negocio  que es el de vender almuerzo  le gusta y le va bien gracias a Dios. Trabaja todos los días con su esposo tiene 4 hijos. La dificultad que tiene es la delincuencia  . A futuro anhela tener su negocio grande y tener su vivienda en buen estado. Con el préstamo comprara (congelador)
texts.en: Elena, 57 (Duran, Guayaquil).  She decided to go into this business because it’s a good way to have money to give her children what’s necessary.  The business is selling lunch; she likes it and does well thank God.  She works every day with her husband and she has four children.  The difficulty she faces is crime.  In the future she hopes to have a big business and to have her house in good condition. She will use the loan to buy a freezer.

loans.use: to buy a freezer.

loans.name: Digna

texts.en:
Digna is a 40 year old, responsible mother of three. All of her children attend school and need daily allowances. She is thankful for the business she has because, in her own way, she provides sustenance for her family. Digna operates a small store selling grocery items to the people in their village and usually gain about PHP5,000 a month doing this activities.

Digna is now asking for a loan of PHP20,000 to buy sardines, canned goods, noodles and soap to sell to her customers. She hopes that someday, she will be able to make her business grow and keep providing friendly services to her customers.

loans.use: to buy sardines, canned goods, noodles and soap to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Oscar Eduardo

texts.es:
Oscar se dedica desde hace aproximadamente 5 años a la reparación de maquinaria agrícola y venta de repuestos para las mismas, negocio con el que ha generado los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar donde convive con su esposa y su único hijo. El taller se ha caracterizado por tener muy buena calidad en su servicio y esto le ha permitido tener muy buenos clientes, lo que a su vez le ha traído muy buenas ventas. Debido a que últimamente ha tenido grandes trabajos de sus clientes, Oscar busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de repuestos de maquinaria para su taller y así poder seguir ofreciendo un buen servicio a sus clientes.

De esta manera podrá tener los recursos necesarios para poder atender bien a sus clientes y así seguirá ofreciendo en su hogar una buena calidad de vida y unas buenas oportunidades económicas.
texts.en:
Oscar has worked for approximately five years repairing farm machines and selling spare parts for them.  With this business he has generated the necessary income to support his home, where he lives with his wife and his only child.  The shop is described as having very good-quality service.  This has allowed him to have very good customers, which in turn has brought him very good sales.

Because lately he has had big jobs for his customers, Oscar is looking for a loan that gives him to opportunity to buy spare machine parts for his shop to be able to continue offering his customers good service.

In this way he will be able to have the necessary resources to be able to serve his customers well, and so continue giving his household a good quality of life and some good economic opportunities.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his shop, to be able to continue giving his customers good service.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda believes that patience and hard work will enable her to reach her goals in life. She is now 58 and was gifted with three children. Being a hardworking parent, she educated all her children despite hardships and difficulties they encountered in life. 

Farming is the main source of her living; she plants rice and vegetables for sale. But due to inadequate income, Rosalinda engages in the hog-raising business to earn additional income. She has been in this business for almost 12 years, earning a profit of PHP 8,000 that she usually spends for their daily consumption and to save for their future. She aims to improve the business and make it viable source of income. She wants to ask for an additional capital of PHP 18,000 to buy feed, vitamins, and vaccines needed for hog-raising. She believes that someday she will make more improvement in the business.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and vaccines needed for hog-raising

location.town: Brgy. Balzain, Dupax del Sur, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Luis Horacio

texts.es:
Luis es un joven emprendedor que al ver que no contaba con recursos económicos suficientes para poder realizar sus estudios universitarios, decidió conseguir un empleo con el que pudiese generar sus propios ingresos para poder costear sus estudios. Luis consiguió un empleo como mensajero y posteriormente compró una moto para poder realizar su trabajo y poder transportarse a la universidad, donde actualmente cursa el segundo semestre de mecánica de aviación. Dado a que su familia no tiene grandes oportunidades económicas, su moto la compró con un préstamo en el cual debe pagar unos altos intereses por este, y es debido a esto que Luis busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de pagar el préstamo con el que compró su moto para trabajar, evitando pagar los altos intereses que le están cobrando por este.

De esta manera podrá pagar unas cuotas más bajas y así su dinero le hará mayor beneficio en el ahorro para su universidad. Luis sueña con poder seguir trabajando y poder terminar su carrera para vincularse a un buen empleo y poder progresar económicamente para colaborar a sus padres.
texts.en:
Luis is a young entrepreneur who, upon seeing that he did not have sufficient economic resources to be able to undertake his university studies, decided to get a job, to be able to generate his own income to pay for his studies.  Luis got a job as a messenger and later bought a motorcycle to be able to do his job and drive himself to the university, where he is currently in his second semester studying aviation mechanics.

Given that his family does not have great economic opportunities, he bought his motorcycle with a loan that has very high interest rates.  It is because of this that Luis is looking for a loan that will give him the opportunity to repay the loan he used to buy his motorcycle for work, avoiding the high interest they are charging him for it.

In this way he will be able to pay lower rates and his money will be more beneficial to him in his savings for the university.  Luis dreams about being able to continue working and finish his studies to get himself a good job and be able to progress economically and help out his parents.

loans.use: to repay the loan with which he bought his motorcycle for work.

loans.name: Jonah Belle

texts.en:
Jonah Belle is 37, married to a farmer and lives harmoniously in a village where the couple plants and harvests rice and vegetables to sell. They help each other in managing their rice farm to increase their yields. They aim to increase their production and income to support the education of their children.

Jonah Belle and her husband want to expand their rice plantation to increase their production. She is asking for a 45,000 PHP loan from ASKI to buy the fertilizers and pesticides needed in rice farming.

Despite the hardship inherent in farming, Jonah Belle and her husband have the determination to achieve their goals. Through patience and hard work the couple believes they can increase their yields and income this coming harvest season.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: John Alvaro

texts.es:
John es una persona muy trabajadora que siempre ha salido adelante a pesar de las adversidades que le ha presentado la vida y ha logrado sacar a su hijo adelante brindándole una buena educación. Desde hace aproximadamente 20 años desempeña la actividad de la fabricación de calzado, gracias a que trabajó para una empresa durante mucho tiempo y adquirió el conocimiento. Cuando se vio en la necesidad de generar mayores ingresos, dado a que es padre soltero cabeza de familia de su hijo de 8 años, John decidió independizarse y montar su propio negocio con el cual pudiera generar ingresos adicionales al de su trabajo como empleado y poder sacar adelante a su hijo. En un principio en su taller de fabricación de zapatos vendía por encargos pocas cantidades, pero con el tiempo estas cantidades fueron aumentando hasta el punto en que hoy se dedica por completo a su taller y esta ha sido su principal fuente de ingresos para el hogar. Gracias a su taller de fabricación de zapatos ha logrado sacar a su hijo adelante y le ha logrado brindar una buena educación. Con la finalidad de seguir creciendo en su taller, ya que ha tenido muy buenos pedidos, John busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de comprar insumos y materias primas para la fabricación de su calzado y comprar herramientas de trabajo con los cuales pueda aumentar su capacidad productiva.

De esta manera su taller seguirá creciendo y podrá seguir teniendo una buena fuente de ingresos para su hogar con el cual su hijo podrá seguir estudiando y poco a poco cumplir su sueño de sacar adelante a su hijo brindándole una buena educación.
texts.en:
John is a hard-working person who has always been able to get ahead, despite adversity in his life. He’s raising his son and providing him with a good education. For approximately 20 years, he’s been a shoemaker and sells shoes. Thanks to his previous job at a shoe manufacturer, he learned the trade. He is a single father, head of the family, and when he found himself in a situation where he needed to earn more income, he started his own business in order to generate additional income and raise his son. At first, his shoe workshop sold few orders, but in time, these orders began increasing to the point where he is now working fulltime at his business and this is his principal source of household income. In order to continue growing in his workshop and to meet all of his orders, John is requesting a loan to buy supplies and basic materials to make his footwear and buy work tools with which he can increase production.

This way, his workshop will continue growing, he’ll continue having a good source of income for his household, his son can continue studying and John can achieve his dream of getting ahead with his son and providing him with a good education.

loans.use: buy supplies and basic materials to make his footwear and buy work tools with which he can increase production.

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
Thelma is 53, married and has four children; two are studying to go to college. She has a sari-sari (general store) where she sells goods such as canned goods, noodles, soy sauce and vinegar.

Thelma wants to extend the variety of stock she sells in her store. She is asking for a 30,000 PHP loan from ASKI to buy snack foods like bread, cookies and soft drinks. She hopes to get more income from the business by expanding on the types of products she sells.

loans.use: to buy snack foods to sell.

loans.name: Dennys Vanessa

texts.es:
Dennys vive en Portoviejo. Tiene 22 años es soltera.
No cuenta que le gusta mucho su ciudad ya que tiene cerca las playas que son muy visitadas por el turismo. También que es difícil encontrar trabajo y por ese motivo muchas personas dejan su cuidad para buscar mejores condiciones de vida. Termino sus estudios y empezó a trabajar como empleada en una casa al ser despedida empezó a vender productos por catálogos. Trabaja sola ofreciendo sus productos a cualquier hora del día. Nos comenta que en su barrio no hay mucha delincuencia pero una época difícil es el invierno ya que donde vive las calles no están asfaltadas y no puede hacer sus recorridos. El crédito lo utilizaría para comprar perfumes, maquillaje y una vitrina para presentar sus productos. Su meta próxima es incrementar sus ventas para tener más ingresos y terminar su carrera de enfermera.
texts.en:
Dennys lives in Portoviejo.  She is 22 years old and single.  She tells us that she really likes her city because of how close the beaches that lots of tourists visit are.

She also tells us that it is difficult to find work.  That is why a lot of people leave the city to look for better living conditions. 

She finished her education and started to work as a domestic employee.  When she was let go she started to sell products by catalogs.  She works alone, offering her products at any time of the day.

She tells us that there is not much delinquency in her neighborhood.  However, winter is a difficult time because the streets where she lives are not paved, and she cannot make her door-to-door sales.

She will use the loan to buy perfume, make-up, and a display case to display her products.

Her next goal is to increase her sales in order to have more income and finish her nursing degree.

loans.use: to buy perfume, make-up, and a display case.

loans.name: Yoeurn

texts.en:
Yoeurn, 41, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. Her husband is an electrician who earns about 8 USD a day. For over two years Yoeurn has bought rice and resold it, earning approximately 3 USD a day.

Yoeurn is requesting a loan of 500 USD to buy construction materials to build a kitchen. Her ambition is to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build a kitchen.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is 39, married, and was blessed with seven children. She and her husband help each other in managing their farmland by planting rice and vegetables for selling. They aimed to increase their yields and income to be able to continue sending their children to school. 

To increase their production, Rosemarie is asking for an additional capital of PHP 45,000 to buy fertilizers and pesticides needed for the maintenance of their rice production. She believes that this loan will enable them to expand their rice plantation and hopes that they will have a fruitful harvest this coming harvest season.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides needed for the maintenance of rice production

loans.name: Rosa Margarita

texts.es:
Rosa ha tenido que superar grandes adversidades en su vida, para lo cual sus ganas de trabajar han sido fundamentales. Rosa es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de sus 7 hijos desde hace muchos años, pues se separó de su esposo y este los abandonó sin hacer alguna contribución económica para su sostenimiento. Debido a la necesidad de generar sus ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar, montó una venta de helados con la cual podía tener unos buenos ingresos y la cual le brindó durante un largo tiempo la posibilidad de tener una mejor calidad de vida en su hogar. Ahora que es más conocida en su sector y que sus clientes la visitan constantemente, Rosa quiere incursionar en un negocio paralelo a este con el cual genere ingresos extras, el cual es una venta de prendas de vestir a través de catálogos y es por esto que busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de prendas de vestir para iniciar su negocio y tener la mercancía para ofrecer a sus clientes.

De esta manera tendrá ingresos superiores con los cuales su familia podrá acceder a una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas. Además, podrá poco a poco ir cumpliendo su sueño de sacar sus hijos adelante y brindarles todo lo que necesitan.
texts.en:
Rosa has had to tackle much adversity in her life, which has fueled her desire to work. Rosa is single and has been the head of the family for many years now. She is the mother of 7 children. Her husband abandoned her and the children, without contributing financially to their upbringing.  
In order to generate income to maintain her household, she started an ice cream sales business so she could generate good income and hopefully provide her family with a better quality of life. Now that she is more known in the area, her clients are constantly visiting her. Rosa is requesting the loan to start another business alongside the one she has now, in order to generate extra income. She wants to start a clothing-sales-by-catalog business.She would be usuing her loan to buy clothing to start her business and offer her clients merchandise.

That way, she will have more income and her family can access a better quality of life and more economic opportunities. Also, little by little she’ll be able to achieve her dream of raising her children while providing them with everything they need.

loans.use: buy clothing to start her business and offer her clients merchandise.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha, de 36 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y decidida, además de ser alegre y amable. Es conviviente con Adolfo, quien es electricista y trabaja como independiente; y es padre de sus 3 hijos Betsy de 18, Mariel de 15 y Fredy de 6 años de edad. Juntos habitan en su propia casa que compraron con mucho esfuerzo. La actividad que realiza Martha es la venta de ropas de segundo uso para damas, caballeros y niños de diversos modelos que  son adquiridos en la capital en cantidades, gracias al apoyo de su amiga quien vive allá, le realiza las compras y se las envía, y luego Martha las vende entre sus amistades y vecinos, a quines atiende de manera amable, logrando ganarse su preferencia. Lleva más de 4 años dedicándose a éste negocio, y hasta el momento le apoya su pareja en búsqueda de nuevos clientes.
Considera su negocio bastante rentable ya que estas prendas se compran a precios muy bajos dejándole buenas ganancias. Le gusta su negocio pues le genera un ingreso económico y tener una ocupación, además de estar en casa y el tiempo libre que lo emplea en le cuidado de sus hijos, y por tanto desea aumentar su stock de mercaderías, así lograra hacer crecer su negocio. Por otro lado, comenta que tiene conocimientos en cocina, teniendo planes de incursionar en el negocio de venta de comidas, de esa manera generarse más ingresos económicos. Este será el préstamo número 8 con la institución MFP. Está muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado se siente a gusto con su banco comunal, pues  considera un grupo unido y solidario.
Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de un mayor número de ropa de segundo uso, para tener un stock disponible para la venta, por lo que espera conseguirlos a menos precios por su compra en mayor volumen.
texts.en:
Martha, age 36, is a hardworking and decisive woman. She is also cheerful and friendly. Martha is in a common-law relationship with Adolfo, who works independently as an electrician and is the father of their three children: Betsy (age 18), Mariel (age 15), and Fredy (age 6). They live together in their own home which they purchased with great effort. Martha's business involves selling different styles of secondhand clothing for women, men, and children. She acquires her inventory in large amounts thanks to the help of her friend who buys the merchandise and then ships it to her. Martha sells to her friends and neighbors. She offers friendly service, thus allowing her to gain customer loyalty. Martha has been in this business for more than four years and, to this day, her partner helps with finding new customers.

She considers her business to be profitable because the clothes that she buys at very low prices help to generate good earnings. Martha enjoys her business because she can earn an income and have a career. She also gets to stay at home and devotes her free time to looking after her children. Martha wants to increase her inventory so that she can grow her business. She says that she also knows how to cook, so she plans to start another business in which she sells food. This will help to generate more income.

Martha is receiving her eighth loan from the MFP organization. She is very pleased to know that she has financial support in order to advance her business. In addition, she is comfortable working with her Communal Bank because the members are a unified and supportive group. The amount of 1,500 PEN that she requested will be invested in a large number of secondhand garments so that she will have available stock to sell. She hopes to get a lower price by purchasing in volume.

loans.use: to buy secondhand clothing.

loans.name: Solidario Redentor En Dios Group

texts.es:
Solidario Redentor en Dios.
Mario  es dueño de una granja de 180 pollos  que cuida diariamente ya que al cumplir 5 semanas de mantenerlos los destaza para luego venderlo en el mercado de la comunidad,es asi como el lucha dia a dia ya que gracias a Dios nos cuenta que sus animalitos poco a poco han ido aumentando,con ese proposito esta solicitando este credito para la compra de pollos ya que no los mantiene por mucho tiempo porque luego crecen los destaza y los vende en las tiendas de la comunidad espera que kiva le pueda ayudar con el credito solicitado.
texts.en:
Solidario Redentor en Dios

Mario is the owner of a farm with 180 chickens that he cares for every day.  After keeping them for five weeks, he butchers them to then sell in the market in the community.  This is how he struggles every day.  Giving thanks to God, he tells us that his animals have grown little by little.

With that goal he is requesting this loan to buy chickens, because he does not keep them very long: they grow, he butchers them, and he sells them in the stores in the community.

He hopes Kiva can help him with the requested loan.

loans.use: to buy chickens to raise and butcher.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth, de 32 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, con muchas ganas de salir adelante.  Está casada con Marco quien es empleado y es padre de sus 2 hijos Vivian de 13 y Marco de 6 años de edad, a quienes quiere mucho. Juntos habitan cómodamente su propia casa que lograron comprar en conjunto con su pareja. La actividad que realiza Elizabeth es la venta de productos de belleza que compra por catálogo y los vende entre sus amistades, familiares y conocidas muchas veces al contado y otras al crédito, logrando buenos resultados y conociendo muchas personas, también cuenta con 2 mototaxis, el primero compro con su capital propio, mientas que el segundo con un préstamo de MFP. 
Lleva en estos negocios cerca de 5 años realizándola con el apoyo de su pareja. Paralelo  a ésta actividad también vende ceviches en las mañanas de manera ocasional durante los fines de semana. Le gusta su negocio pues puede manejar sus tiempos libres para dedicarlos a sus pequeños hijos a quienes quiere mucho y son su motivación para salir adelante. Además de los ingresos económicos que le genera, puede apoyar a su pareja y pagar los gastos de su hogar. Ahora tiene planes de seguir trabajando ya que se siente bien y conforme con lo que hace. Este será el préstamo número 7 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecida con la oportunidad de contar con un línea de crédito para avanzar con su negocio, además comenta sentirse e a gusto con banco comunal pues considera a sus miembros ser personas responsables y amables.
Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en el trámite de los documentos de sus mototaxi como la renovación de su seguro y tarjeta de circulación. De esa manera pondrán seguir trabajando y generándole ganancias.
texts.en:
Elizabeth, age 32, is a hardworking and industrious woman who has tremendous drive to succeed. She is married to Marco, who is employed and the father of their two children: Vivian (age 13) and Marco (age 6). She loves her children dearly. They live comfortably in their own home, which she and her partner were able to buy together. Elizabeth sells beauty products through catalogs and offers her merchandise to friends, relatives, and frequent acquaintances for cash and on credit. She has achieved good results and has been able to meet many people. Elizabeth also owns two motorcycle taxis. She bought the first one with her own money and the second one was obtained with an MFP loan.

Elizabeth has managed her businesses for nearly five years with the help of her partner. At the same time, she sells "ceviche" (a marinated seafood dish) in the mornings and occasionally on the weekends. She enjoys working because it enables her to devote her free time to her small children, who she loves very much and provide her with the motivation to push forward. With the income she generates, Elizabeth is able to help her partner with the household expenses. She now has plans to continue working because she feels good and is comfortable with what she does.

This will be her seventh loan with the MFP organization. She is grateful for the opportunity to receive a line of credit for advancing her business. In addition, Elizabeth says that she likes her Communal Bank and considers its members to be responsible and friendly people. The amount of 1,000 PEN that she is requesting will be invested in the registration documents for her motorcycle taxis and the renewal of her insurance and driver's license. This will enable her to continue working and generating income.

loans.use: to pay for her vehicle registration documents, insurance, and the renewal of her driver's license.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Doña Mercedes de 57 años de edad casada con el señor Ángel,tienen dos hijos ya estan casados, ella a sido una mujer emprendedora le gustan los negocios y desde hace años se a dedicado a la compra y venta de ganado,tejidos a mano,inicio desde cuando sus hijos eran pequeños para el sostenimiento de ellos,y de su hogar y para mejorar sus condiciones de vida se vio en la nececidad de apoyar a su esposo para que juntos lograran tener un lugar donde vivir y tener una casa bonita,es asi como empeso su negocio,es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mas ganado para la venta,el suño de ella es tener unida a su familia y hojala que le puedan dar ese apoyo que nececita.
texts.en: Doña Mercedes, 57-years-old, is married to Señor Ángel and they have two children who are already married.  She has been an enterprising woman who likes business and for many years has made a living through the purchase and sale of cattle, and hand-weaving, which she began when her children were small in order to support them and her family and to improve their living conditions.  She saw the need to support her husband so that together they could manage to have a place to live and a beautiful house.  This is how she began her business, and it is for this reason that she is asking for this loan to buy more cattle to sell.  Her dream is to have her family come together and hopefully they will give her the support that she needs.

loans.use: to buy cattle to sell.

loans.name: Maria Patricia

texts.es:
La señora Maria Patricia es casad, tiene 23 años de edad, cursó los grados de secundaria y estudió para prestar sus servicios en un salón de estética, tiene 1 hijo, se dedica al comercio, inicio este negocio vendiendo regalos, y hasta el momento lleva 5 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la albañilería.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de más productos para su negocio, consistente artículos de cocina, peluches, cristalería, cuadros para retratos, etc., lo cual es necesario para que pueda vender más y mejorar sus ingresos de ganancia. Espera en el futuro contar con otros locales.
texts.en:
Maria Patricia is married and is 23 years old. She studied through high school and also took courses so that she could offer her services in a beauty salon. She has one son and works in business. She started this business selling gifts five years ago. Her husband supports her business efforts; he works as a contractor. 

She has requested a loan to buy more products for her business. She will buy items for the kitchen, stuffed animals, glassware, picture frames, etc. This is necessary so that she can increase her sales and improve her income. She hopes that in the future she will have more store fronts.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her gift store.

loans.name: Shirinbibi

texts.ru: Ширинбиби прекрасная женщина, трудолюбивая. Более 19 лет занимается предпринимательством. Она замужем имеет троих детей .Дети взрослые. Муж пенсионер поэтому она сама зарабатывает на содержание семьи. Она занимается торговлей детской мужской и женской одежды. С наступлением весны она обновила ассортимент своего товара и скоро жаркое лето и товары опять требуют пополнения. Для этого она хочет получить займ и пополнить ассортимент товаров летней одеждой она надеется на вашу помощь.
texts.en: Shirinbibi is a beautiful, hardworking woman.  She has been an entrepreneur for over 19 years.  She is married and has three children, all of whom are adults.  Her husband is a retiree, and this is why she earns a living for the family.  Shirinbibi is involved in selling children's, men's and women's clothing.  With the onset of spring, she updated her merchandise selection, and now that hot summer is coming soon, she needs to update her merchandise again.  This is why Shirinbibi wants to obtain this loan and refill her merchandise selection with summer clothing, and she relies on your help.

loans.use: to buy a selection of summer clothing

loans.name: Elida Estela

texts.es: Elida Estela,tiene 44 años de edad tiene tres hijos y una niña,ella se dedica a la venta de carbon por mayor y tambien a la venta de miel tomate y aguacate,ella desde las 3 de la mañana sale para donde vende a atender a sus clientes su negocio lo tiene ya desde hace 12 años ella siempre trata la manera de ayega temprano a su casa ya que sus hijos estan estudiando y aparte de eso tiene sus animalitos, pollos, esta solicitando este credito para la compra de carbon y sus verduras de lo que ella vende,
texts.en: Elida Estela is 44 years old and has three boys and one girl.  She works selling coal in bulk, and she also sells honey, tomatoes and avocados.  She leaves at 3 in the morning to get to where she makes sales in order to serve her clients.  She has been working with the business for 12 years.  She always tries to arrive home early since her children are studying, and in addition she has small animals, chickens, to care for.  She is asking for credit in order to purchase coal and the vegetables that she sells.

loans.use: To purchase coal and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Angelica Susana

texts.es:
La señora Angelica Susana es casada, tiene 33 años, cursó los 6 años de educación primaria, tiene 3 hijos los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la tejeduría de cortes típicos, lleva 10 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien la poya económicamente.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilos de diferentes colores y también de diferentes clase, hilos de mish y alta seda, espera en el futuro su negocio crezca.
texts.en:
Angélica Susana, 33, is married and went to all six grades of elementary school.  She has three children who are attending school. She weaves traditional fabrics and has ten years of experience. She has the economic support of her husband. 

She is requesting a loan to buy thread in assorted colors and also of different kinds, of "mish" [rayon with a silk-like appearance] and of silk.

She hopes her business will grow in the future.

loans.use: to buy thread.

loans.name: Sharifa

texts.ru: Шарифа- целеустремленная женщина,мать троих детей:двое девочек и сын.Старшую дочь выдала замуж,а сын окончил школу и сейчас уехал в Россию на заработки,младшая дочь учится у мамы её ремеслу-пошиву женской одежды.На первый кредит Шарифа купила вышивальную машинку и обучает свою дочь вышивке.Сейчас большая потребность на её услуги и во время весеннего сезона у Шарифы будет много клиентов.После покупки вышивки её дела пошли хорошо-она сама шьёт и придумывает различные узоры и фасоны на женские платья.
texts.en: Sharifa is a goal-oriented woman and a mother of three children: two daughters and a son.  She married off her oldest daughter, son graduated from school and went to Russia for work, and the youngest daughter is learning how to sew women's clothing from her mother.  Sharifa used her first loan to buy an embroidery machine and is teaching her daughter embroidery.  Sharifa's services are now in high demand and she will have many clients during the spring season.  After purchasing an embroidery machine, her business started to go well - she sews by herself and creates various patterns and fashions for women's dresses.

loans.use: to buy furniture

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina is patiently selling grocery items to the people in the village where she lives with her spouse, who is her partner in operating the business, and her children. She has eight children, three of whom attend school. and four who live separately with their own families already.

Marina would like to increase the merchandise she offers and so is requesting a loan of P15,000 to buy more soft drinks, biscuits, eggs, and sardines to sell. She provides friendly service to her customers and hopes to keep acquiring customers and generating greater profits. Marina hopes to save enough funds both for her children's education and to invest in developing the business.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, biscuits, eggs, and sardines to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Anselmo Israel

texts.es:
El señor Anselmo Israel es casado, tiene 38 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos los cuales están estudiando, cursó los 3 años de educacion primaria, inició este trabajo como operario y luego estuvo un tiempo trabajando en su casa, y ahora ya que ya tiene un taller, quiere mejorar su producción, la elaboración de puertas y ventanas de metal Y aluminio, actualmente lleva 10 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para comprar herramientas martillo, tenaza, destornilladores, sujetadores, soldadura, etc. Espera segur creciendo y tener un negocio amplio.
texts.en:
Mr. Anselmo Israel is married and is 38 years old.  He has three children who are currently in school pursuing three years of primary education.  He began his business as a Blacksmith first as an operator and then working in his home, and now that he has his own shop, he wants to increase production, making doors and windows of metal and aluminum.  He currently has 10 years of experience.

He is asking for a loan that he will use to buy tools like a hammer, pliers, screwdrivers, braces, welding tools, etc.  He hopes to continue growing and having a healthy business.

loans.use: To purchase tools for his work

loans.name: Munira

texts.ru: Мунира молодая мама троих детей-занимается предпринимательской деятельностью в течении года.Её родственники живут в Турции и они присылают ей товар по сниженным ценам.Она реализует их по доступным ценам из дома своим клиентам.Теперь собирается открыть новую торговую точку в многолюдном месте,так как товарооборот увеличивается.Её муж-Шавкат тоже работает своим  бизнесом,он охотник,рыбак ,а также занимается куплей-продажей скота на скотном рынке.Кредит берет на новую весеннюю партию товара.Старшие сыновья Муниры имеют ларек,где продают диски фильмов и вносят свой небольшой вклад в семью.
texts.en: Munira is a young mother of three children and has been involved in an entrepreneurship for a year.  Her relatives live in Turkey and send her merchandise at a low cost.  She sells it at affordable price from home to her customers.  Currently, Munira is planning to open a new retail outlet in a populated place because her goods turnover is increasing.  Her husband, Shavkat, also has his own business - he is a hunter and a fisherman, and is also involved in buying and selling livestock at a livestock market.  She is requesting this loan to buy a new selection of spring merchandise.  Munira's oldest sons have a kiosk, where they sell movie disks and provide their small input to the family.

loans.use: to buy a spring selection of merchandise

loans.name: Paquita

texts.es:
Paquita, de 52 años de edad, es una mujer amable y trabajadora con muchas ganas de salir adelante.  Es conviviente con Isaías quien se dedica a la agricultura y es padre de sus 4 hijos Luís de 23, Paola de 21, Isamar de 18 y Anita de 12 años de edad.  Vive en compañía de su pareja y sus hijos, habitando su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Paquita es la venta de plátanos durante el día,  para eso cuenta con una mesa que instala en le frontis de su casa, desde donde atiende de manera muy amable y cordial a sus clientes que en su mayoría son sus vecinos. También vende comidas preparadas como guisos, juanes, tallarines y otros por las noches en el frontis de su casa. Iniciándose con un préstamo de MFP hace más de 2 años, logrando crecer contando con el apoyo de su pareja. Considera su negocio bastante rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja por la regular clientela que ha sabido ganarse en el tiempo que lleva en su negocio.
Le gusta su negocio pues le ha permitido salir de sus apuros económicos, decidiéndose  por la necesidad económica que atravesaba así como poder apoyar a su pareja con los gastos de su hogar. Pero, no le gusta cuando algunas veces no puede vender todo sus productos y se llega a malograr pero eso no la desanima, y realiza mejor sus cálculos de sus compras y adquiere lo necesario y evita que se descomponga, además tiene planes de hacer crecer su negocio e incrementar sus ventas.
