With this loan she will buy a freezer

loans.use: to buy a freezer.

loans.name: Vorn

texts.en: Vorn, 66, is married and resides with her husband and one child in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in fishing for more than ten years, earning approximately USD 8 per day. Due to the difficulty in the family’s transportation, Vorn is requesting a loan of USD 600 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase will help her carry fish to sell as well. In the future, she would like to purchase farmland for growing rice to generate extra income to support her family and help her child get a bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel   de 41  años vive  (playas  Guayaquil). El decidió entrar a este negocio porque es una buena manera de tener dinero para poder darles lo necesario a sus hijos. Este negocio  es la venta de ropa playera comenzó vendiendo ceviche en la playa luego decidió vender ropa playera en el malecón de playas. Le gusta y le va bien gracias a Dios. Trabaja todos los días solo  su esposa lo dejo   tiene hijos y quiere darle todo lo que necesiten sus hijos. La dificultad que tiene es la delincuencia. a futuro anhela tener su negocio grande y tener su casa en buen estado . Con el préstamo comprara ( ropa )
texts.en: Manuel is 41 years old and lives in Playas (Guayaquil). He decided to go into this business because it is a good way to have money to be able to give the necessities to his children. His business is selling beach clothing. He began selling ceviche on the beach, then he decided to sell beach clothing on the  boardwalk at the beach. He liked it, and it is going well for him, thanks to God. He works alone every day. His wife left him. He has children and wants to give them everything they need. The difficulty that he has is crime. In the future he wants to have a large business and to have his house in good condition. With the loan he will buy clothing to sell.

loans.use: to buy beach clothing to sell

loans.name: Antonio

texts.en:
With his long experience in farming, Antonio shares that his expertise in the field is continually improving. Antonio has managed his rice farming business for more than 20 years. He is married and has four children as the fruit of love with his wife. Antonio’s wife is engaged in a tailoring business. His wife's income from the business is used for daily consumption in the household.

Antonio encounters difficulties in fulfilling his needs in farming. Thus, he needs financial support to meet these needs.  He has decided to seek a loan of  PHP 27,000 to buy seeds and fertilizers for his farm. Antonio hopes to receive the loan as it would be beneficial for him in maintaining his business.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for his farm.

loans.name: Anush

texts.en:
Anush is 36 years old. She lives in Aygestan village with her husband, pensioner mother-in-law and two sons. Anush's husband, Albert is 43 and works at the local school. Her two sons, Artur and Arman, are 16 and 18 and are both involved in the agricultural business. Anush and her husband are also involved in agriculture. They run a farm, where they grow potatoes, corn, greens and grapes. 
Anush wants to purchase 60 poles for the grape trees, as they are growing year by year. With the loan's help she will also purchase 100 saplings of apple and fertilizer. This will allow Anush to develop her farm and have a stable source of income for her and her sons' families in the future.

loans.use: to pay for poles for grape trees, apple saplings and fertilizer

loans.name: Um

texts.en:
Um is 44 years old and a humble villager from Batey district, Kompong Cham province. She has a common-law relationship with her husband; they both work as rice farmers. She has been in this business for many years. For additional income, Um owns and operates a grocery shop selling beef soup with vegetables in her neighborhood. Now she is responsible for three single children, two of whom are employed and work in the construction field.

To satisfy the family's living needs, Um would like to take out a loan of USD 400.00 to purchase a used motorcycle for home use. This will enable her family to avoid paying for motor-taxi service as they have previously. In the future, Um wants to expand her grocery shop and save some money to buy an extra plot of farmland to increase her rice production.

loans.use: to purchase a used motorcycle for home use.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es: Marco  de 24  años vive  (isla   Guayaquil). El decidió entrar a este negocio porque es una buena manera de tener dinero para poder darles lo necesario a sus hijos. Este negocio  es la venta de frutas. Le gusta y le va bien gracias a Dios. Trabaja todos los días  con la ayuda de su esposa  tiene hijos y quiere darle todo lo que necesiten sus hijos. La dificultad que tiene es la delincuencia. a futuro anhela tener su negocio grande y tener a una familia unida . Con el préstamo comprara (mercadería  frutas)
texts.en: Marco is 24 years old. He lives in Isla, Guayaquil. He decided to go into this business because it is a good way to have money to be able to give his children the necessities. His business is selling fruit. He likes it, and it is going well for him, thanks to God. He works every day with the help of his wife. He has children and wants to give them everything they need. The difficulty that he has is crime. In the future, he wants to have a bigger business and to have a united family. With the loan he will buy fruit to sell.

loans.use: to buy fruit to sell

loans.name: Ashrf

texts.en:
Ashrf is 31 years old, married and lives with his two children. He has owned a grocery store for one year where he sells basic household necessities such as beans, milk, eggs, soap, and other items. His store is very well known in the area and has a lot of customers, as everything he sells is excellent quality and priced affordably--besides, the service is exceptional. 

Ashrf is an enterprising man, always ready to work to improve himself and succeed in the future. He thinks we gain strength from what we learn to overcome. He decided to apply for a loan that will allow him to buy staple grains, instant products, candy, drinks, etc. He has faith that in this way, he will be able to give his family a better quality of life. In the future, he would like to expand his business as well as buy a bus in order to transport his goods from market to his business smoothly.

loans.use: to buy staple grains, instant products, candy, drinks, etc for his business

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en:
Hussein, 52 years old, is a married man. He has two daughters.

Hussein has been working in the distribution business for almost 12 years. After getting some experience, Hussein has decided to start his own business in the same field, and he chose to distribute cosmetic products mostly to beauty salons.

Now Hussein has applied for this loan to increase the inventory he has and add new brands to expand his distribution area, thereby improving the business level.

loans.use: to increase his inventory of cosmetics products
